story:
LETHAL CREATION: INVASIÓN CHECA

Esto será uno de los esfuerzos mas ambiciosos y grandes que hemos hecho hasta ahora y necesitamos de la ayuda de todos ustedes para hacer esto realidad! Hemos sido invitados a tocar a uno de los festivales de metal más grandes de República Checa, FAJTFEST! Este festival con sede en Velke Mezirici nos convoca a ser participes de su Line up de un festival de 3 días de música, gracias a esta convocatoria otros promotores locales de República Checa nos han llamado para la posibilidad de hacer nuestra aparición en un TOUR EN SU PAÍS Y SUS ALREDEDORES del viejo continente, esto es una de esas grandes oportunidades que no llegan tan fácil y estamos muy orgullosos de que de todas las bandas latinas que pudieron llamar nos hayan escogido a nosotros para presentar nuestra música. Este tipo de oportunidades no se deben desaprovechar y nosotros como banda buscamos llevar un espectáculo y una calidad que sea digna representante de nuestro país en cualquier parte del mundo. Si logramos realizar este tour de forma exitosa como lo tenemos planeado, ustedes amigos habrán sido parte de un paso muy grande e importante en nuestra carrera musical como banda y en nuestras carreras independientes como músicos! Mas abajo de la historia van a encontrar un vistazo de toda la pre-merca. De verdad amigos, estamos muy emocionados y listos por este próximo capitulo en nuestras vidas y carreras, vamos a darle!!! :)

 

A DONDE VAN LOS FONDOS RECAUDADOS?

Todo lo recaudado será destinado a todos los gastos de renta backline/transporte durante el tour “INVASION CHECA” que son del día 9 de Julio al 15 de Julio del 2019, la producción y grabación de un nuevo video totalmente hecho por nosotros en diferentes partes de Europa durante la estadía, los gastos de vuelos extras del Crew extra involucrado para la producción del video, toda la impresión de mercancía y envíos correspondientes, si logramos esto y empujamos con todo nuestro esfuerzo este proyecto que es tan enormemente ambicioso, de verdad amigos van a volverse locos con el material que vamos a darles! Ya no podemos esperar más de la emoción!

EL IMPACTO

Esto nos ha tomado por sorpresa, pues nos llegó la noticia en este 2019 y nos hemos concentrado en planear como aprovechar de mejor manera esta oportunidad, a base de eso hemos logrado que nuestros amigos en República Checa nos ubiquen de mejor manera, con la alineación actual por fin encontramos un equipo que se siente libre, potente, seguro y ambicioso de tocar en todos los escenarios que se nos abran, ustedes amigos merecen lo mejor de nosotros y no duden que haremos todo por que se lo merecen mas que nadie, hemos estado en tour desde hace mas de 5 años y nuestros seguidores siempre han visto nuestra entrega en cada show, ellos mismos nos han preguntado cuando ocurrirá un tour en Europa, ahora es el momento! Hagamos este tour y este video memorables para nuestro país y para todos! Con tu ayuda lo podemos lograr!!!!

OTRAS MANERAS DE PODER AYUDAR!

Si no tienes fondos que contribuir con nosotros pero aun así quieres poner tu grano de arena para que este tour y este video sucedan, por favor ayúdanos contándole a todos tus amigos y familiares lo que estos queretanos están tratando de hacer, riega este mensaje por todos lados y hazlo continuamente, grita por todas las calles de tu ciudad y que todos lo sepan! Es mucho muy difícil para los músicos como nosotros llevar estas metas acabo, nuestras situaciones financieras no pueden soportar en lo absoluto un proyecto de esta magnitud, es por esto que necesitamos de su ayuda amigos! No tenemos una disquera que nos respalde, solo estamos nosotros 5, nuestro Crew, nuestras ganas y deseos de llegar lejos, más lejos de lo que se ha llegado antes, este proyecto es lo que podría ser la diferencia para nosotros en nuestras carreras. De nuevo amigos, no podemos estar mas emocionados y preparados para esto! Estamos muy ansiosos de que todos vean y escuchen el video que estamos planeando! Queremos adelantarnos y agradecer a todas y cada una de las personas que se están sumando con nosotros en esta gran esfuerzo, tengan por seguro que serán enormemente recompensados con algo muy especial de parte de todos en LC.
Muchas gracias a todos amigos!! Esto es el inicio de algo muy grande e increible!!!

-Maldos

-Gus

-Darío

-Kano

-David
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

Disco

Playera Sublimada

Playera Serigrafía

Tank Top Serigrafía



Hoodie Serigrafía



Gorra

story:
Hello!

My name is Timothy Britten Jr. and the name of my gospel group is TBJ & Holy Nation. I've always had a passion for music. I started playing piano at the age of 7 and then fell in love with playing music. At a young age I loved how music lifted me up when I was down, calmed me when I wanted to do something that I might regret, and made me want to be a better person. I decided that I wanted to help others through music the way that it has helped me through many hard times. That's why my group (Holy Nation) and I are making this project. To encourage people to follow Jesus through different types of music. The core of our ministry is gospel and we desire to spread the love of Christ as far as we can. I believe that stepping out musically will extend our reach to many more people in need of encouragement and love.

What does it sound like?

This is a very musical project. If you enjoy bands like Snarky Puppy and artist such as PJ Morton, Joe Sample, Vashawn Mitchell, Earnest Pugh, Eric Benet, Chick Corea and Cory Henry & The Funk Apostles then I believe you will enjoy this project. Music creates emotions. It can change the atmosphere. On this project, each track is different from the last. Some songs will put a smile on your face and make you want to move. Some songs will close out everything that's going in the wrong direction in your life and let you know that with Jesus, everything is going to be alright. I believe in diversity; so there's a song for everybody on this project.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This is truly a dream that I've had for many years and I believe that Holy Nation and I are equipped for it. But to fulfill this dream it's going to take funds. We're going to use these funds for studio time, mixing and mastering, compensate the musicians, provide professional camera team, music promotion and make sure everything is at top quality from music to even merchandise. 

As a thank you for your support you can choose from multiple gifts plus perks including digital downloads, signed CD's, our t-shirts and more.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to help financially right now, that's fine. Please help by sharing this campaign and spreading the word on facebook and other social media platforms. Your help makes all the difference.

Thank you so much and God Bless You!

story:
Here goes everything.

Jay Schneider of When We Ruled H-Town is heading up this psychological operation by directing and editing a jaw dropping music video for the song "Drunken Fist" from our upcoming album Black Magic White Noise.

Very few people have heard this album, not even band members were allowed copies. Shortly after it was recorded, it was sent 25 years into the future by the High Priest of Vortexas.  The world was not ready.

Today you have the power to unlock the mysteries of this powerful canticle.

 

So this is what is going to be happening!

Feared Alien Voodoo has an album that is being mixed and mastered for release. After a limited vinyl run, the full length album will be made available on all streaming services.

The band turned down two major label contracts in the 90's because they refused to compromise their artistic integrity.  Now, thanks to you and Indigogo, they don't have to!  You are the record executive!  The fate of their world is in your hands.

You decide if Feared Alien rises from the ashes or is banished to the Fantomb Zone!

Get ahead of the game. Be the first on your block to own the raw and uncut never before released, and recently unearthed Sugar Hill Sessions captured by Dan Workman in 1998. We call the raw tracks White Magic Black Noise.  This will be the only place that this collection of music will be available until the funds to release Black Magic White Noise  in its final form are raised.

Feared Alien Voodoo is planning for many free releases - from covers songs to podcasts but some projects require the stupid earth tickets you call money. Most advanced civilizations do away with this lesser magic but we created this campaign as a way to sneak past the gatekeepers. We are no longer slaves to corporate media. With your help we can finally create content on our terms.

 

We are creating this Indiegogo as a thank you to everyone that has made this possible!!!

 

Specifically Jay and Jimmy. Neither of these gentlemen have asked for dime.  They think that the music is worthy, no matter how unbelievable that is to us at times. We hope that the rest of the world agrees.

We want to show our appreciation to those who have already spent their hard earned money and precious time helping us create quality content.

We think that this is also a great way for F.A.V. to say "Hello, World"

Our story spans a thousand lifetimes and extends way beyond these dimensions. Please join us on our magical musical adventure and find out why music will save the world.

We will be discussing all this and more on the Feared Friends podcast. All your burning questions will be answered!!!

What happens if nobody donates?

 

Nothing. You will still get the video, but our dreams for a video game, a virtual reality music video, and an independent record label will melt into a puddle of "what ifs".

 

Where does the money go?

 

25% goes to editing equipment and cameras

25% goes to the recording studio

25% creating the label & website

10% songwriting & music

10% artwork

5% indie go go

We will be giving everyone that donates $5.00 or more an mp3 of the remastered "Drunken Fist" - first recorded at Sugar Hill Studios - Restored and Mixed by Jimmy at Feared City Studios (in association with Guilty Ghost Sound & Greased Razors).

 

 

Also das ist, was passieren wird! Feared Alien Voodoo hat ein Album, das gemischt und für die Freigabe beherrscht wird. Nach einem limitierten Vinyllauf wird das Full-Length-Album auf allen Streaming-Diensten zur Verfügung gestellt. Die Band hat in den 90er Jahren zwei große Etikettenverträge abgelehnt, weil sie sich weigerten, ihre künstlerische Integrität zu kompromittieren. Nun, dank dir und Indigogo, müssen sie nicht! Du bist der Plattenspieler! Das Schicksal ihrer Welt liegt in deinen Händen.

 

これは起こっていることでしょう！
Feared Alien Voodooには、リリースのために混在して習得されているアルバムがあります。限られたビニール・ランの後、全長のアルバムはすべてのストリーミング・サービスで利用できるようになります。

彼らの芸術的完全性を損なうことを拒否したため、バンドは90年代に2つの主要なレーベル契約を断った。今、あなたとインディゴゴのおかげで、彼らはする必要はありません！あなたは記録的な幹部です！彼らの世界の運命はあなたの手にある。

所以這是將要發生的事情！
Feared Alien Voodoo有一張專輯，正在混合和掌握釋放。有限的乙烯基運行後，全長專輯將提供所有流媒體服務。

樂隊在90年代拒絕了兩個主要的標籤合同，因為他們拒絕妥協他們的藝術完整性。現在，感謝你和Indigogo，他們不必！你是記錄執行！他們的世界的命運在你的手中。

 

Tak tohle je to, co bude dít!
Obával Alien Voodoo má album, které je už namixované a upravené pro uvolnění. Po omezenou vinyl běhu, budou dány k dispozici po celé délce album u všech služeb datových proudů.

Kapela odmítla dvě hlavní smlouvy štítků v 90. letech, protože oni odmítli dělat kompromisy své umělecké integrity. Nyní, díky tobě a Indigogo, nemají to! Jste záznam výkonný! Osud jejich svět je ve vašich rukou.

 

Так это то, что будет происходить!
Боялись чужеродных вуду имеет альбом, который перемешивается и освоены для выпуска. После того, как ограниченным тиражом винил, полный альбом будет доступен на всех потоковых услуг.

Группа отклонила два крупных контракта на этикетке в 90-х годах, потому что они отказались ставить под угрозу их художественную целостность. Теперь, благодаря вам и Indigogo, они не должны! Вы запись исполнительной власти! Судьба их мира находится в ваших руках.

 

 

Så dette er hva som kommer til å skje! Fryktet Alien Voodoo har et album som blir mikset og mastret for utgivelse. Etter en begrenset vinyl sikt vil fullengder gjøres tilgjengelig på alle streamingtjenester. Bandet slått ned to store label kontrakter på 90-tallet fordi de nektet å svekke deres kunstneriske integritet. Nå, takket være deg og Indigogo, de trenger ikke å! Du er posten utøvende! Skjebnen til deres verden er i dine hender.

 

Joten tämä on mitä aiotaan tapahtumassa!
Pelätty Alien Voodoo on albumi, jota sekoitetaan ja masteroitiin luovutettavaksi. Jälkeen rajoitettu vinyyli aikavälillä, täyspitkä albumi on saatavilla kaikille streaming palvelut.

Bändi kääntyi alas kaksi suurta etiketti sopimusta 90: n, koska he kieltäytyivät vaarantaa niiden taiteellisen eheyden. Nyt, kiitos teille ja Indigogo, ne eivät tarvitse! Olet levy johtoon! Kohtalosta maailma on käsissäsi.

 

그래서이 일이 될 것입니다 것입니다!
두려워 외국인 부두는 혼합 릴리스 마스터되는 앨범이 있습니다. 제한된 비닐 실행 한 후, 전체 길이 앨범은 모든 스트리밍 서비스를 제공한다.

그들의 예술적인 무결성을 손상하는 것을 거부하기 때문에 밴드는 90 년대에 두 가지 주요 레이블 계약을 거절. 지금, 당신과 Indigogo 덕분에, 그들은 필요 없어! 당신은 기록 임원 있습니다! 자신의 세계의 운명은 당신의 손에 있습니다.

 

Så detta är vad som kommer att hända!
Fruktade Alien Voodoo har ett album som blandas och behärskar att släppas. Efter en begränsad vinyl sikt kommer fullängdaren göras tillgängliga på alla streamingtjänster.

Bandet tackade två stora etikett kontrakt på 90-talet, eftersom de vägrade att kompromissa sin konstnärliga integritet. Nu, tack vare dig och Indigogo de inte måste! Du är rekord verkställande! Ödet av deras värld är i dina händer.

 

 

 

WorldWide

После того, как ограниченным тиражом винил, полный альбом будет доступен на всех потоковых услуг.Группа отклонила два крупных контракта на этикетке в 90-х годах, потому что они отказались ставить под угрозу их художественную целостность. Теперь, благодаря вам и Indigogo, они не должны! Вы запись исполнительной власти! Судьба их мира находится в ваших руках.  Så dette er hva som kommer til å skje! Fryktet Alien Voodoo har et album som blir mikset og mastret for utgivelse. Etter en begrenset vinyl sikt vil fullengder gjøres tilgjengelig på alle streamingtjenester. Bandet slått ned to store label kontrakter på 90-tallet fordi de nektet å svekke deres kunstneriske integritet. Nå, takket være deg og Indigogo, de trenger ikke å! Du er posten utøvende! Skjebnen til deres verden er i dine hender. Joten tämä on mitä aiotaan tapahtumassa!Pelätty Alien Voodoo on albumi, jota sekoitetaan ja masteroitiin luovutettavaksi. Jälkeen rajoitettu vinyyli aikavälillä, täyspitkä albumi on saatavilla kaikille streaming palvelut.Bändi kääntyi alas kaksi suurta etiketti sopimusta 90: n, koska he kieltäytyivät vaarantaa niiden taiteellisen eheyden. Nyt, kiitos teille ja Indigogo, ne eivät tarvitse! Olet levy johtoon! Kohtalosta maailma on käsissäsi. 그래서이 일이 될 것입니다 것입니다!두려워 외국인 부두는 혼합 릴리스 마스터되는 앨범이 있습니다. 제한된 비닐 실행 한 후, 전체 길이 앨범은 모든 스트리밍 서비스를 제공한다.그들의 예술적인 무결성을 손상하는 것을 거부하기 때문에 밴드는 90 년대에 두 가지 주요 레이블 계약을 거절. 지금, 당신과 Indigogo 덕분에, 그들은 필요 없어! 당신은 기록 임원 있습니다! 자신의 세계의 운명은 당신의 손에 있습니다. Så detta är vad som kommer att hända!Fruktade Alien Voodoo har ett album som blandas och behärskar att släppas. Efter en begränsad vinyl sikt kommer fullängdaren göras tillgängliga på alla streamingtjänster.Bandet tackade två stora etikett kontrakt på 90-talet, eftersom de vägrade att kompromissa sin konstnärliga integritet. Nu, tack vare dig och Indigogo de inte måste! Du är rekord verkställande! Ödet av deras värld är i dina händer.   WorldWide

story:
My son has been selected to go on a cricket tour overseas and we do not have the funds to send him.  

I am a single mother and would like to give him the opportunity to go and am trying to raise funds.  If you are passionate about sports development and would be able to assist him any small amount will help him reach his goal.

My son is 16 years old and has played provisional cricket for the last five years for school and for club cricket and is very committed to the sport.
If you need any other information you are welcome to contact me.

story:
Short Summary

 

  • FreeriderS > https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FvyDWyF6avM
  • I present myself, I am Carlo Barbini, born in Venice in the 1990! I have studied piano since I was 5 years old. With the teenage, aside the piano and the beautiful classical music, I started also playing the keyboard, then the guitar, then I started singing, along discovery of the big of rock and roll music, Nirvana and Queens of the Stone Age, above all were and are my passions...I then moved to Berlin when I was 23 and started my career as a songwriter, singer, as a solo and also with several bands. Music is everything to me and that's why I never stopped following this dream...and that's why I am here, now, with my bandmates, to ask for your fundamental help in the realization of this big big dream, we can't wait to give our best to.
  • As I said, music is everything to me...a reason of life with no doubts...music can tear you up when you are down....music can do so much...to the people and to the world...music has helped me and enriched me so much through the years and now it's time that I give her something back. Something good, of course.
  • FreeriderS are here to give a powerful output of hope and will to make the world better! "Beat down the president"  ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mLm8jC9C3Hc  ) is the title of a song from us...too many presidents around the world are doing only their good...things did not get so much better from the past as we could think...dictators are still there, maybe disguised, but they're still there and they are ruining the people and our beloved Earth only for their dirty avidity of money and power...let's rise up people and do something about this!! We know that we are many! But we have to act, most importantly!! Such themes are the focus of our music, in songs like "Stand up and fight" or "Easily"  (   https://soundcloud.com/rletz-2/easily  ) for example...let's give a sign people...we don't like it as it is now and we wanna change!! 
  • With your precious help, we are eventually gonna be able to put all the magic and power of music into reality...music is so great because it allows you to say something in a way, that words alone could never compare to...with your help we are gonna achieve the best that we can do to our music and to our message: record it with proper equipment, with a proper experienced producer and with the proper promotion! Let's do this guys!!!

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • What we need are 6000 euros. Why: 2000 euros for the producer, 2000 euros for the pressing (vinyls, cds, digital download codes...), 500 euros for everything which is not exquisitly music, that is t-shirts, bags, design and press, 500 euros for mixing, 750 euros for mastering and 250 euros for the crowdfunding fees. Every money surpassing the goal will go straight into the production of a music video for one of the LP's track
  • As rewards for your donations we have a lot of beautiful rewards, such as fresh freeriding t shirts, as well as badass graphic cds and vinyls...

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't donate, please spread the word!!! THANK YOU!!!

story:
I'm at a choice point. Your decision will help me decide.

Over the past 2 and a half years, with the gracious support and feedback of my Patreon music blog subscribers, I’ve written 16 new songs, covered 9 more and posted around 40 recordings. The 10 songs in "Sky" are the cream of the crop. They were recorded in my living room on my Macbook and carry the energy that was present at the birth of the songs. There is spontaneity, vulnerability and a bit of magic -- and a lot of love in these recordings.

I’m now at a choice point and I need your input.

Is this music a blessing for a few or a powerful contribution for a wider audience?

I want to be clear that I’m going to release this album regardless of the outcome of this campaign (if you've ever been 40 weeks pregnant or were close to someone who was, you know what I mean). I can do it on a shoestring and only reach a few people, or do it bigger and reach more. The question that you can help me answer is, what do I have to work with when manufacturing and promoting and performing the music? 

What I Am Asking For & What You Get

Below is a chart that gives an overview of what I'm requesting in three phases from the most basic to the most abundant.  There are a couple of shorthand references on the chart explained in more detail below.

  • Piano repairs: My mighty but elderly Roland digital piano has developed some problems over the years that have me borrowing my son’s newer piano. I’m grateful that he will share but but I prefer the higher quality and power of the older Roland.
  • Additional songs #1 and #2: with additional funds I would be able to set aside the time and space to record two more of my new songs and get them ready for the wider world. While not necessary for the album to hang together, they would be awesome additions.
  • Personal Expenses:  The final phase of bringing the music to the general public is a time and energy intensive process, and having a financial buffer will allow me the ability to have clearer and more powerful focus for it.

Why raise funds if I could produce the CD on a shoestring like my other albums?

I've been writing and recording songs since 2008 as my personal practice, acutely aware of the way that music affects me on every level, and I have wanted to make sounds that help me access the mental and emotional states I want to experience, and also benefit other people who are listening to it. Sharing the music has been a wonderfully organic and serendipitous process up to the present moment, and I've had many people write and tell me that this music has made a powerful difference in their lives whether they are listening to it during their commutes, relaxing in a yoga studio or while doing tai chi, sharing it in hospice settings or playing it to their unborn children and new babies . . . 

I am so grateful for the synchronistic way that the music seems to travel where I could never have predicted and I feel mind-blown and blessed by the number of people who tell me how much my music means to them. But I am feeling a shift and the sense that there is a wider world that would benefit from having the vibrations that are coming through this process that is increasingly a shared and community process. I am envisioning having a team of musicians who help to bring the songs I've written into a whole new level of expression and being able to pay them honest money for their dedication and gifts.

And with your help, we'll do it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please help me get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • It's easy and convenient to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Join me in envisioning this album reaching all the people who can benefit from it, and fully receiving the music in a powerful way that is just right for them.

And that's all there is to it.

story:
As many of you guys know, I have been making music for the last 15 years. From Power Metal to more extreme genres, I always did put all my guts and passion in what I do. My power metal past gave me more experience, technique and recognition in the local metal scene. My first album with the band Eclipse Prophecy named "Days of Judgement" was released worldwide and was generally acclaimed pretty much everywhere it went. 

Now it's time for me to complete my Blackened Death Metal solo project. I started to work on this in 2012 when I released my first 5 tracks EP named "Spiritual Genocide". I did put this project on ice for a while but decided to complete it for good. In the last few months I did write several tracks and got up to 18 original tracks that are featured on this double album and will also feature guest solos from several bands in the local and international scene (Confirmations to follow).

The tracklist goes as follow:

ACT I - Spiritual Genocide

Spiritual Genocide
Enter the Cataclysm
Reptilian Queen
Eye of the Cyclone 
Barbaric
Extreme Game of Power 
Spiraling Darkness Insight
Existence is Futile
The Walking Dead (Original song inspired by the TV Series)
Epilogue (Darkest Descent)
----------------------------------------------------
ACT II - The Darkest Descent

Gargantua
Chimera
The Blackening
Morbid Prototype
The Flesh of God
Abyssal Screams
Volatile
Heathens Sailing Over the Northern Tides
Black Dragon (Dissection cover)
The Road to Devastation (Kataklysm cover) 

As you can see this is going to be a HUGE album. A total of 20 songs spanned on 2 CDs, with a total of over 100 minutes of music! This is why we need YOUR help with this. Since it's a LOT of material the production cost is pretty expensive. I am recording and mixing everything myself, took a lot of time to design the logo, the album cover, and even every single t-shirt design. I used a lot of my own time and money for this.

I hope to raise $3500 CAD with this campaign, helping me to pay for a big part of the album. I will always be grateful for everyone that supported me over the years and hope to be able to keep making music for a long time ahead! I am making a lineup to play concerts eventually so don't worry, you WILL be seeing this project live in the coming future! Stay connected for more! Until then, STAY METAL!

story:
Overview

Over our 10 year history we've only released 2 LP's and 5 EP's but have toured constantly with 5 North American tours and 3 EU tours and numerous festival appearances and we have done that all consistently with creative drive and support from YOU THE FANS. Now that we are close to our 3rd record we are looking to you to help us finish it by pre-selling the album now. Please watch the unreleased songs via KEXP now and help support us by contributing to the album that will be released next year.

Short Summary

Thanks for supporting us.  We love you

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

We need $1000. This goes towards getting us back in the studio and finish recording the 2nd half of the record. Then we will use the other half of the money for mixing and mastering to make this record up to the standards of our previous material

Check out our perks, there's something for everyone.  The "Pre Sale Love" is just good ole fashion donation, but I mean...  work with us in a session, buy our vinyl package, get a signed CD - there's so much you can do.  Know that we appreciate it all very much

If we exceed our goal, there's a few things that the band will use the money towards.  We need new stage lights and Steve needs a new bass head.  

Please spread the word on this one

We get it if you're poor, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

Click that share button to let everyone know what we're working towards achieving.  ?

story:
Our story:

Meaning The Originals in Swahili, Asili was created through our shared passion for creating music. Founded by a group of friends who shared in the joy of making music together, the members of Asili Vocal Ensemble started their musical journeys singing for the South African National Youth Choir, where they all fell in love with each other on a harmonic sphere. 


Since its foundation in 2018, Asili has made huge strides in terms of the scope and range of performances. Apart from private functions, some of their performance highlights include performing with the Cape Philharmonic Orchestra and renowned opera singer Aviva Pelham on the SoundsCape and CPO Spectacular productions in 2019 as well as performing live on South African breakfast show Expresso. 


Built on love, respect and the representation of musical diversity, the sounds of Asili are deeply intertwined with traditional African choral undertones while incorporating classical, opera, pop and jazz into our sound. Our mission is to create magical, music moments that warm the hearts of our audiences and brings people together. 

What we need: 

In association with Namaste Works Arts Alliance, the Asili Vocal Ensemble has been invited to take part in the following international program:

A 5-day cultural exchange, where we'll be leading a workshop with young adults from Denver. 

During this masterclass series, we'll be engaging with young performing artists from different backgrounds and sharing our unique South African culture and lessons we've learnt since the start of our performance careers. This is also an opportunity for us to hone our skills under the guidance, coaching and instruction of accomplished Broadway artists while connecting with fellow students who share the same artistic passions. 

In addition to the masterclass series, our stay in Denver will culminate in a performance with the Boulder Symphony Orchestra, where we'll be performing a selection of contemporary favourites, beloved classics and traditional African repertoire.

This is a once in a lifetime opportunity for us and we need your help to make this dream a reality! While we’ve covered our U.S. expenses, we still need to raise funds for air travel, Visa expenses and travel insurance.

With 10 vocalists, a musical director, a videographer and tour manager on board, here's a breakdown of our travel expenses:

As flights are subject to availability and cost, we've estimated that we need at least $20 000 to go towards air travel. 

A further $ 5000 will be allocated to VISA applications and travel insurance. 

Right now, our musical director, videographer and tour manager are volunteering their time and skills but ideally we'd like to get them paid. In the event, we raise more than what's required to get us overseas, we'd include a fee for the work they've put into making this tour happen. 

What you'll get: 

You investing in our journey means the world to us! Without your support, this wouldn't be possible. We'd like to say thank you by offering the following perks: 

$5: Digital thank you! 

This perk includes a signed picture of the Asili choir, a personalised note and a digital download of the concert performance taking place in Denver. 

$10: Send a musical message 

Share the love by choosing from a range of musical messages. Like a barbershop quartet but for the digital age, this 30-second clip can be shared across social media, sent via Whatsapp or Messenger, or attached to an email. Click the musical message perk tab for a list of options. 

$25: Music message bundle 

Tired of sending the same boring e-card? Show that special someone that you truly care with our lovingly created range of musical messages. This bundle includes 5 x standard musical messages that can be shared across social media, sent via Whatsapp or Messenger or attached by email. 

$50: Personalised musical message 

Create a unique musical moment by sending us a 200-character message that we'll sing, record and send to you. Forget gender reveal cakes! Share your exciting news with a customised musical video. Haven't spoken to your grandmother in a while? Send that special person in your life a special message. 

$50: Asili US Tour video 

Get a behind the scenes look at our journey from Cape Town, South Africa to Denver Colorado. Covering the masterclass series and concert with the Boulder Symphony Orchestra, this video will be a visual and aural treat for any music lover. 

$100: Asili Fan Package

You love us, you really love do love us!  Save 33% and get the ultimate Asili fan package and get the following items: 

1 x personalised thank you note with a digital download of the Asili concert performance
1 x digital video of the concert in Denver, Colorado
5 x standard 30-second musical messages
1 x personalised musical message of up to 200 characters
1 x Asili US Tour Video 

The Impact

While we'd be thrilled to share our cultural heritage with the world, our real mission is to transform the South African music industry through the promotion of diversity and inclusivity.

Any additional funding will be allocated to creating a workshop series for underprivileged kids in South Africa. Utilising the knowledge and skills we'll gain in Denver, this workshop series is not only an opportunity to give back to our communities but also a way to continue to bring people together through the love of music. 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge right now is funding.

Many of the necessary steps such as Visa applications and flight ticket purchases require funding to move forward. 

While we've saved up to create promotional material to assist with our campaign and all expenses when we touch down in the U.S.A are covered, our biggest concern is that we'll not be able to raise enough capital to proceed with our Visa applications and flight tickets.

Other Ways You Can Help

We, more than most, understand that not everyone has the means to contribute financially. 

You can still help us by sharing our campaign. We've worked out that if 5000 people donate $5 each, we'll be able to reach our funding target, so getting the word out there is integral to realising our funding goal. 

Follow us on our journey by heading to our social media pages: Instagram |  Facebook | Youtube
story_txt:
Our story:
Meaning The Originals in Swahili, Asili was created through our shared passion for creating music. Founded by a group of friends who shared in the joy of making music together, the members of Asili Vocal Ensemble started their musical journeys singing for the South African National Youth Choir, where they all fell in love with each other on a harmonic sphere. 
Since its foundation in 2018, Asili has made huge strides in terms of the scope and range of performances. Apart from private functions, some of their performance highlights include performing with the Cape Philharmonic Orchestra and renowned opera singer Aviva Pelham on the SoundsCape and CPO Spectacular productions in 2019 as well as performing live on South African breakfast show Expresso. 
Built on love, respect and the representation of musical diversity, the sounds of Asili are deeply intertwined with traditional African choral undertones while incorporating classical, opera, pop and jazz into our sound. Our mission is to create magical, music moments that warm the hearts of our audiences and brings people together. 

What we need: 
In association with Namaste Works Arts Alliance, the Asili Vocal Ensemble has been invited to take part in the following international program:
A 5-day cultural exchange, where we'll be leading a workshop with young adults from Denver. 
During this masterclass series, we'll be engaging with young performing artists from different backgrounds and sharing our unique South African culture and lessons we've learnt since the start of our performance careers. This is also an opportunity for us to hone our skills under the guidance, coaching and instruction of accomplished Broadway artists while connecting with fellow students who share the same artistic passions. 
In addition to the masterclass series, our stay in Denver will culminate in a performance with the Boulder Symphony Orchestra, where we'll be performing a selection of contemporary favourites, beloved classics and traditional African repertoire.
This is a once in a lifetime opportunity for us and we need your help to make this dream a reality! While we’ve covered our U.S. expenses, we still need to raise funds for air travel, Visa expenses and travel insurance.
With 10 vocalists, a musical director, a videographer and tour manager on board, here's a breakdown of our travel expenses:
As flights are subject to availability and cost, we've estimated that we need at least $20 000 to go towards air travel. 
A further $ 5000 will be allocated to VISA applications and travel insurance. 
Right now, our musical director, videographer and tour manager are volunteering their time and skills but ideally we'd like to get them paid. In the event, we raise more than what's required to get us overseas, we'd include a fee for the work they've put into making this tour happen. 
What you'll get: 
You investing in our journey means the world to us! Without your support, this wouldn't be possible. We'd like to say thank you by offering the following perks: 
$5: Digital thank you! 
This perk includes a signed picture of the Asili choir, a personalised note and a digital download of the concert performance taking place in Denver. 
$10: Send a musical message 
Share the love by choosing from a range of musical messages. Like a barbershop quartet but for the digital age, this 30-second clip can be shared across social media, sent via Whatsapp or Messenger, or attached to an email. Click the musical message perk tab for a list of options. 
$25: Music message bundle 
Tired of sending the same boring e-card? Show that special someone that you truly care with our lovingly created range of musical messages. This bundle includes 5 x standard musical messages that can be shared across social media, sent via Whatsapp or Messenger or attached by email. 
$50: Personalised musical message 
Create a unique musical moment by sending us a 200-character message that we'll sing, record and send to you. Forget gender reveal cakes! Share your exciting news with a customised musical video. Haven't spoken to your grandmother in a while? Send that special person in your life a special message. 
$50: Asili US Tour video 
Get a behind the scenes look at our journey from Cape Town, South Africa to Denver Colorado. Covering the masterclass series and concert with the Boulder Symphony Orchestra, this video will be a visual and aural treat for any music lover. 
$100: Asili Fan Package
You love us, you really love do love us!  Save 33% and get the ultimate Asili fan package and get the following items: 
1 x personalised thank you note with a digital download of the Asili concert performance1 x digital video of the concert in Denver, Colorado5 x standard 30-second musical messages1 x personalised musical message of up to 200 characters1 x Asili US Tour Video 

The Impact
While we'd be thrilled to share our cultural heritage with the world, our real mission is to transform the South African music industry through the promotion of diversity and inclusivity.
Any additional funding will be allocated to creating a workshop series for underprivileged kids in South Africa. Utilising the knowledge and skills we'll gain in Denver, this workshop series is not only an opportunity to give back to our communities but also a way to continue to bring people together through the love of music. 

Risks & Challenges
Our biggest challenge right now is funding.
Many of the necessary steps such as Visa applications and flight ticket purchases require funding to move forward. 
While we've saved up to create promotional material to assist with our campaign and all expenses when we touch down in the U.S.A are covered, our biggest concern is that we'll not be able to raise enough capital to proceed with our Visa applications and flight tickets.

Other Ways You Can Help
We, more than most, understand that not everyone has the means to contribute financially. 
You can still help us by sharing our campaign. We've worked out that if 5000 people donate $5 each, we'll be able to reach our funding target, so getting the word out there is integral to realising our funding goal. 
Follow us on our journey by heading to our social media pages: Instagram |  Facebook | Youtube

story:
What's going down

As has become a tradition here at Hope, the Campus Ministries worship teams recorded another live worship album this fall. The purpose of these albums is to have representative examples of the songs with which we worship. They give people exploring Hope College a taste of our campus life, enable current students and alumni to continue to engage in worship by listening, and are useful for the worship teams as we work to improve our musicianship and pass the songs along to coming generations.

How can you get involved?

First, Help float this funding campaign! The good news is, the more you give, the more we'll give back! Just order whichever perk most piques your interest and we'll let you know when and where to pick up your stuff!

Second, Spread the word! Share this campaign with your friends and family. Lets come together to share in something beautiful.

story:
Short Summary

  • We are "Seven Day Sons." We are a Rock outfit from Montreal, Canada.
  • We need your help to bring this album from our minds to our hands. This band is everything we've ever dreamt about and it would mean the world to us if you can contribute to this campaign!
  • If you aid in funding our debut record, we'll be able to finish recording our first full-length album; along with supplying YOU, our contributors, to many special perks and packages!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need $7000 to record our first, full-length LP. With your contribution, we will be able to get our team back in studio, record the rest of the record, package and distribute it!
  • We have 7 unique perks and or packages which will include some of our fine merchandise directly from our "Seven Day Sons Pop-Up Shop." 
  • Along with this campaign, we filmed 3 live-full band videos at Avbury Studios, which we will be hosting to Facebook & YouTube starting October 7th. Our campaign closes on November 28th, 2017. Extention with "Indiegogo InDemand" on January 7th, 2018. 
  • If we do not reach our goal, well... that'll be a drag! However, the funds will still go towards funding our record to ensure our album gets released!

The Impact

  • We've been very fortunate to be receiving positive responses and interaction from music professionals and fans across the world from all social media outlets. Your support will help us continue to make the music we love. By reaching our goal in this campaign, we will be able to share our record on a much larger scale!

Risks & Challenges

  • We will still encounter budget issues. Recording an album (independently) involves a lot of planning from the start to finish. Marketing the record will be one of the many challenges to come. We will need to release another single before the record is out, which involves the production of our next music video. From that point, we then need to be marketing the single along with the record on social media & YouTube. Later, we'd be pitching our LP singles to radio, hire a PR representative to talk to industry professionals about our record - and finally, going on tour. This is just a summary of the process behind recording an album. But we're up for the challenge!  
  • We will be putting in our own hard-earned money to complete the record and to ensure the record is complete by our expected release date. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Even if you cannot help us fund our goal... We still love you! However, if you can share this page with your friends across social media, we'd love you even more! ;)
  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

 

Thank you all,

your Seven Day Sons

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:
“The Rondel Roberts Band” is a neo-soul band from Calgary, Alberta, that borrows from a variety of classic and modern genres such as 70's soul, feel good funk, classic rock and golden era boom bap. TRRB adorns groove/backbeat oriented performances with contemporary original content and reinterpreted covered material that is bound to make listeners move.

Tube driven guitar tones, “sweet spot” bass lines, pulsating drums topped with sultry vocals are characteristics that draw listeners to TRRB’s profound songwriting and masterful soundscaping.

 

  • Releasing an album opens up touring to a start up band and we would love to take our music to the road.
  • By helping us reach our goal, your are contributing to an industry that depends on the transcendence of good music. We are from the bandstand and we need your help to produce a record that will stand up in a saturated market.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We need studio time with a talented engineer and world class equipment.
  • We will reciprocate in the form of digital content, merchandise, private performances packages and advance karma.
  • We have every intention of taking this campaign all the way. All the funds gathered here will go towards making a record. We appreciate your relentless support.

Good music that makes you feel good should be shared with the world and documenting music is an expensive endeavor. All we need is a little boost. 

Other Ways You Can Help

please use Indiegogo's sharing tools incase someone in your network might be able to help us reach our goal!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Eniola Anna Abioye. I was born in London, raised here in the States. I have loved words my whole life. Music, writing and design have been my favorite ways to express myself. I decided to launch this campaign to receive funding for an EP.

What We Need & What You Get

The full amount, I am asking for is $6000.

The money will cover the cost of production, mixing and mastering each song on the album, as well as paying musicians and creatives that will help create the sound.

If fully funded, by the end of November, beginning of December, at the latest, I'll have an EP (electronic album) for all to download off of iTunes and hear on various online music platforms. 

Risks & Challenges

If I am honest, I am nervous and scared. I have tried before to garner funds for big projects and failed miserably. How is this time different? It is different because I realize that fear is just the door I walk through to get to the other side of my biggest dreams, not the thing that holds me back. If I fail, I will not stop. I won't lick wounds. I will keep going, because I am convinced that this isn't just about scratching an itch, but fulfilling my destiny.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please pray and send me what you are sensing from the Lord, I want to hold these up as affirmations and confessions.

Share and spread the word through Facebook and Instagram.

Also, feel free to email me and send me messages!!

Love you:)

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Brian Gaudet. I have been a musician for 13 years now. I have put out a few releases already but I am ready to begin my next adventure!
  • I am asking for help raising funds so I can record all 23-24 songs and really put out an album that packs a punch.
  • By helping me fund the album, you will also help me achieve a lifelong goal to have that one release that really defines my career.

What We Need & What You Get

  • I am asking for $2,000 so I can record everything I have written. Not all $2,000 may go to recording. Anything that is left over will go towards merchandise and possibly even a couple more songs!
  • By donating, you can get anything from a production credit to a digital download to even a private Skype concert!
  • In the event that I don't reach my goal, every cent will till go towards recording as much as I can.

The Impact

  • I can't guarantee this album will be legendary. But if you enjoy folk music and love supporting artists, then this is your chance!
  • This is the first time I have tried crowdfunding. Please give me a chance.
  • I know if you give me the chance, you will have an album you will find yourself listening to over and over again!

Risks & Challenges

  • Regardless, this album will happen. I am asking for help to give you the opportunity to be a part of my adventure!
  • If the goal is not achieved, the record will still happen. It just may take longer to release.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • There is no shame in not being able to help! If you can't donate, please share this campaign so maybe someone you know will help!
  • Share, share, share!

story:
Manayunk JazzFest  is a 3-day live music celebration from April 2-4 featuring 30+ acts of gypsy jazz, traditional jazz and blues, Latin jazz, jam sessions, and everything in between! The festival kicks of Philadelphia's Jazz Appreciation Month and pays homage to the musical roots that have brought an immense amount of culture and history to our city. Proceeds will go to Jazz Bridge (read more below). This is the first year of the festival, but we hope to make it an annual celebration!

Who are we?  We are a group of music and art-lovers, jazz-enthusiasts, creators, and community-oriented individuals excited about keeping Philadelphia's musical roots alive, and passionate about bringing more music and art to Manayunk! The festival is the brainchild of One Nickel Co-Working - an event venue and co-working space that thrives on bringing creatives and communities together. But 11 other local venues/restaurants are participating and helping us bring this festival to life!

Why are we doing this?  To bring together musicians and music-lovers to celebrate the incredible Philadelphia jazz and blues scene! All of us truly believe in investing in downtown Manayunk as a prime spot for music, art, and community togetherness. Your generous contribution would support us in doing this, and in celebrating the beautiful jazz culture that makes our city so unique. In turn, you would also be supporting the important work of Jazz Bridge - the local non-profit collecting proceeds from this year's festival.

Jazz Bridge assists local blues and jazz musicians coping with life-altering health, legal, financial, personal and professional crises by advocating for their needs, bridging financial and logistical gaps, and increasing employment opportunities and awareness of the local jazz sound.

Where does my contribution go?  As it stands now, our only festival funding is coming from headliner ticket sales and any cover charges venues choose for the evening. While this covers some general promotion and payment to the headliners, as well as some supply costs for venues, all other aspects will come straight from the pockets of those individuals helping to make this festival happen. Your contribution and support would go to:

  • Fair payment to all other musical acts
  • Hiring event staff for a smooth, problem-free festival
  • All promotion & preparation costs
  • Providing memorable merchandise
  • (donation to local non-profit Jazz Bridge?)

If we don't reach the funding goal, the amount raised will still go towards this list of costly things, allowing us to bring the best quality acts and merchandise to the festival, and helping us bring a festival that is enjoyable, seamless, and easy to navigate. So any amount at all helps!

Are there other perks to donating? Absolutely! Depending on the dollar amount, you can redeem key chains, tote bags, tees, and admission into certain shows! Check out the perks section for more info.

What if I can't contribute money?  While even small dollar amounts can make a big impact, we understand some people just can't contribute at all. But that doesn't mean you can't help in other ways! Share on socials, Facebook groups, with co-workers, family, friends... any noise you can create around our campaign is a solid contribution, and so appreciated! 

---------------------------------------------------------

If you're part of the creative community, or a fan of jazz, music, or the arts - or if you simply want to see more high-quality affordable events in Manayunk, then this call is for you. Help us make the FIRST YEAR of Manayunk JazzFest so successful, that it becomes an annual festival! Help us expand Manayunk as a hub for artists, music, and creatives. Please make a donation today and share this page with your network; even the smallest contribution will make an impact!

Visit the website: http://www.manayunkjazzfest.com; http://www.onenickelcoworking.com

Follow us on Facebook & Instagram: @manayunkjazzfest

story:
My name is KRENA,  and I am changing the way people hear Contemporary Soul/R&B Music. 

I am an Alternative R&B and Electro Soul artist from Brooklyn, NY.  What most people don't know about me is that I am apart of an Astrological Spiritual Community of Readers, Healers and those who have overcome trauma. I began my musical journey as a youth performing in Music Theatre shows. Creating music with a story and meaning is my passion. 

If you love Alicia Keys and Audra Day, then you may enjoy the sound of 'MANTRAS'.

People have compared my style to the Swedish, Electronic Soul band "Little Dragon". My main thing has been along the lines of alternative/indie r&b with overtones of soul and undertones of jazz. However, my culture is definitive; new age spirituality.

Being a visionary creative person is challenging and fulfilling. I love being free to create and yet it is so important to me to release high-quality productions. This is why funding is so important in this project. I want to release an EP that is impactful and will reach those who need to hear it. All the while, keeping my priorities to my family as a new mom!

 

THE STORY BEHIND 'MANTRAS'

I've had serious phases of feeling insecurity, sadness and just being stuck. I self medicated for years on marijuana.  I was tired of being someone for everyone else. I wanted to live life free. And for me that became an addiction.

But it's not marijuana that was the problem. It's not the perceived enemy that is ever the problem. Because if it's not drugs, then its sugar, if its not sugar, then its sex..and then it's something else. All these things have no game, unless I choose to play it. It was my addictive need for relief. I wanted to push down feelings of shame, loneliness, and abandonment. The feeling I hated the most was the FEELING of desire, When you have big dreams...you have big desires. And the feeling of desire without results, was too painful to bare.


Everyday I am learning to be okay with wanting and needing what I do not have. During my 2 years of sobriety, I had been writing music about my sexual freedom and expression. I was creating a whole different sound. But, I felt something was missing. An origin story was the missing link. 'Mantras' is the origin story of how I healed myself back from addiction.  'Mantras' came to me in a daydream vision of a Sunflower. It was then, that I decided to take a left turn from what I was creating, and prioritize the release of 'Mantras' for Summer 2019. 

 

THE SONGS

The music is about self-love and overcoming challenging phases in life. I am aiming for a release date of August 6, 2019.

The conceptual image of the EP is the vision of a SUNFLOWER... Because Sunflowers are always growing towards the light. As a celebration of my sobriety, and a bold move towards my dreams... I know this music is going to help all of those who are growing out of their darkness and who are turning towards their own light. I call these types... The Sunflower Gang.

The EP is actually extensive. There are mantras and their are full songs. Here is a breakdown of the music you will hear! 

Track #1 - Phases - mantra for moving through life, knowing change is constant 

Track #2 - In the Sun -  finding your light and being around other light beings 

Track #3 - This Universe - mantra for the collective conscious and feeling unified

Track #4 - Eckhart Tolle -  during a mental breakdown, how i found New Age Spirituality 

Track #5 - Somebody - mantra for holding on to your dreams

Track #6 - The Only Ones - a song about how we want others to be happy too

Track #7 - I am not alone - mantra to remind ourselves that we don't have to do it alone

Track #8 - My Religion - a song about bringing religion back to love 

Track #9 - Not Afraid of No - mantra for dealing with rejection

Track #10- To the Moon - a song about eternal love

 

What will I use the Funding on? (You are the Record label)

When you donate today, you have a strong hand in building the marketing campaign for this EP. Record labels spend millions of dollars on their artists for advertisement and outreach. With this campaign money, I will use the majority of the funds to create my own marketing outreach through Facebook, Instagram and Youtube advertisement. It is very important to get the high frequency of this music into as many ears as possible! I've learned these techniques from working in the Savvy Musician Academy, which is an online platform for indie artists to learn marketing. 

 

See a breakdown of costs: 

For Marketing 

  • Website - Shopify for selling Music and Merch $29/month for 12 months = $348 total
  • $10/Day FB ads for mailing list  = $300/month, for 2 months = $600 total 

For Production

  • Securing Instrumental Licensing
  • Microphone Upgrade
  • Music Video production = Camera Rental, Studio Rental, Costuming, Make-Up Artist = approx $550 total

IF WE HIT $500 

Purchasing of the licensing to instrumentals and recording the songs that are not produced by KRENA.

IF WE HIT $1000

We can begin the marketing campaign for the EP, which will be a way in which people all over the world who are looking for positive soul vibes can be introduced to KRENA and her movement. 

 

IF WE HIT $1500

Proper costuming, staff and production can fund the music video for the single release of the EP, which gives more velocity to the exposure of the EP. 

 

IF WE HIT $2000

We have succeeded past the goal!!!! Wow. If we hit this LANDMARK, KRENA can continue to pour into marketing and music videos for the rest of the songs on the EP. This will ultimately bring major exposure to KRENA and you will have had a hand in her rise.

 

IF WE HIT $3000

We have succeeded past the goal!!!! KRENA will go on tour! And use the tour money to fund the next ALBUM, which is already in the works! 

 

How you Can Help

1. Become an Investor Now! 

Choose one of the offers on this campaign! Offers are as little as $5 with DOPE gifts and rewards.

2. Share with someone who wants to support the mission.

Just hit one of the share buttons at the top of this page.

3. Comment on the Page to help get this campaign more visible on the site! 

 

PERKS

The perks chosen for this campaign are tied to the theme of MENTAL HEALTH, SELF CARE and positivity. At the lowest donation, you are showing that you support this cause. At the highest donations, you are not only going to enjoy the music of my EP, but will get an indulgent experience to help satisfy your own Mental Health and self care.
story_txt:
My name is KRENA,  and I am changing the way people hear Contemporary Soul/R&B Music. 
I am an Alternative R&B and Electro Soul artist from Brooklyn, NY.  What most people don't know about me is that I am apart of an Astrological Spiritual Community of Readers, Healers and those who have overcome trauma. I began my musical journey as a youth performing in Music Theatre shows. Creating music with a story and meaning is my passion. 
If you love Alicia Keys and Audra Day, then you may enjoy the sound of 'MANTRAS'.
People have compared my style to the Swedish, Electronic Soul band "Little Dragon". My main thing has been along the lines of alternative/indie r&b with overtones of soul and undertones of jazz. However, my culture is definitive; new age spirituality.
Being a visionary creative person is challenging and fulfilling. I love being free to create and yet it is so important to me to release high-quality productions. This is why funding is so important in this project. I want to release an EP that is impactful and will reach those who need to hear it. All the while, keeping my priorities to my family as a new mom!
 
THE STORY BEHIND 'MANTRAS'
I've had serious phases of feeling insecurity, sadness and just being stuck. I self medicated for years on marijuana.  I was tired of being someone for everyone else. I wanted to live life free. And for me that became an addiction.
But it's not marijuana that was the problem. It's not the perceived enemy that is ever the problem. Because if it's not drugs, then its sugar, if its not sugar, then its sex..and then it's something else. All these things have no game, unless I choose to play it. It was my addictive need for relief. I wanted to push down feelings of shame, loneliness, and abandonment. The feeling I hated the most was the FEELING of desire, When you have big dreams...you have big desires. And the feeling of desire without results, was too painful to bare.

Everyday I am learning to be okay with wanting and needing what I do not have. During my 2 years of sobriety, I had been writing music about my sexual freedom and expression. I was creating a whole different sound. But, I felt something was missing. An origin story was the missing link. 'Mantras' is the origin story of how I healed myself back from addiction.  'Mantras' came to me in a daydream vision of a Sunflower. It was then, that I decided to take a left turn from what I was creating, and prioritize the release of 'Mantras' for Summer 2019. 
 
THE SONGS

The music is about self-love and overcoming challenging phases in life. I am aiming for a release date of August 6, 2019.
The conceptual image of the EP is the vision of a SUNFLOWER... Because Sunflowers are always growing towards the light. As a celebration of my sobriety, and a bold move towards my dreams... I know this music is going to help all of those who are growing out of their darkness and who are turning towards their own light. I call these types... The Sunflower Gang.

The EP is actually extensive. There are mantras and their are full songs. Here is a breakdown of the music you will hear! 
Track #1 - Phases - mantra for moving through life, knowing change is constant 
Track #2 - In the Sun -  finding your light and being around other light beings 
Track #3 - This Universe - mantra for the collective conscious and feeling unified
Track #4 - Eckhart Tolle -  during a mental breakdown, how i found New Age Spirituality 
Track #5 - Somebody - mantra for holding on to your dreams
Track #6 - The Only Ones - a song about how we want others to be happy too
Track #7 - I am not alone - mantra to remind ourselves that we don't have to do it alone
Track #8 - My Religion - a song about bringing religion back to love 
Track #9 - Not Afraid of No - mantra for dealing with rejection
Track #10- To the Moon - a song about eternal love
 

What will I use the Funding on? (You are the Record label)
When you donate today, you have a strong hand in building the marketing campaign for this EP. Record labels spend millions of dollars on their artists for advertisement and outreach. With this campaign money, I will use the majority of the funds to create my own marketing outreach through Facebook, Instagram and Youtube advertisement. It is very important to get the high frequency of this music into as many ears as possible! I've learned these techniques from working in the Savvy Musician Academy, which is an online platform for indie artists to learn marketing. 
 
See a breakdown of costs: 
For Marketing 

Website - Shopify for selling Music and Merch $29/month for 12 months = $348 total
$10/Day FB ads for mailing list  = $300/month, for 2 months = $600 total 

For Production

Securing Instrumental Licensing
Microphone Upgrade
Music Video production = Camera Rental, Studio Rental, Costuming, Make-Up Artist = approx $550 total

IF WE HIT $500 
Purchasing of the licensing to instrumentals and recording the songs that are not produced by KRENA.
IF WE HIT $1000
We can begin the marketing campaign for the EP, which will be a way in which people all over the world who are looking for positive soul vibes can be introduced to KRENA and her movement. 
 
IF WE HIT $1500
Proper costuming, staff and production can fund the music video for the single release of the EP, which gives more velocity to the exposure of the EP. 
 
IF WE HIT $2000
We have succeeded past the goal!!!! Wow. If we hit this LANDMARK, KRENA can continue to pour into marketing and music videos for the rest of the songs on the EP. This will ultimately bring major exposure to KRENA and you will have had a hand in her rise.
 
IF WE HIT $3000
We have succeeded past the goal!!!! KRENA will go on tour! And use the tour money to fund the next ALBUM, which is already in the works! 
 

How you Can Help
1. Become an Investor Now! 
Choose one of the offers on this campaign! Offers are as little as $5 with DOPE gifts and rewards.
2. Share with someone who wants to support the mission.
Just hit one of the share buttons at the top of this page.
3. Comment on the Page to help get this campaign more visible on the site!

story:
Hi everyone!

I'f you'v been following me for a while now, you have more than likely heard my story, but for those of you who have not, I will give you the low down about me!

My passion for music goes way back to when I was a little boy. I've always had that deep love for it, like you just can't explain it, and you know that you have to do everything you can to have more of it! Music is  in my blood! My grandmother was a singer/performer in a country jamboree band that traveled between Iowa, Illinois, and Missouri, and all over the tri-state area. She was also in many local country showdowns  as well.  I took the stage at the young age of 8 years old, and I can still remember it like it was yesterday. I got up in front of 2000 or more people and sung Achy Breaky Heart by Billy Ray Cyrus, and The Thunder Rolls by Garth Brooks.

After that my life took a darker turn. My mother at the time had a mental illness and she was deemed unfit to take care of us kids, so we were sent off to a foster home, long story short our dad saved us, and took us home to live with him.

I grew up writing what was to me at the time silly songs, and I noticed that my love for music grew stronger with each new experience in my life. I would spend hours alone in my room, just playing the piano, or coming up with words to songs.

 

Fast Forward, because you guys do not want to hear about every detail of my life...

I joined the Army, took my keyboard as a way of holding onto my roots. I got involved with the wrong people, and I got into drugs, alcohol, and other substances, which led down a path to depression and a few suicide attempts. I suffered through one failed relationship after another. I lived to tell this story, and somehow by the grace of God, I am alive today, so that I can write these beautiful songs for you.

All of the songs on this album, I wrote about something that was going on in my life, whether it was a breakup, drug addiction, surviving suicide attempts, to writing songs about my mother's mental illness.

I've received so many positive testimonies from you guys, and that has made me want to get this music out to you even more!

I am putting my music career in your hands, and relying solely on fan support!

I've put together a 10 song full length album that has a little something for everyone in it!

 

A couple of my main key points is, I want to bring awareness to suicide, mental illness, and addiction into the light with songs like "Alice", "Momma Went Crazy", and "Don't Grab Your Gun", or people struggling with their self image with songs like "Flawless".

 

I hope that after hearing my music, that you leave with a better understanding that forgiveness is possible, your not alone in hard times, you can get through anything life throws at you, there is a light at the end of the tunnel, and with a lot of hard work, dedication, and determination, you to can make your dreams come true!

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

Well I would love to be able to do this on my own, but the truth is, without a label, or financial backing, it's very hard and very expensive to make music. That is why I am leaving my career in the hands of God, and you guys! That is why I created this campaign, because I believe I have the best fans in the entire universe, and together we can make this happen! By pre-ordering my album, or buying some of the awesome rewards  I am offering you guys, you can help make the album of my dreams.

Have you ever been in a music video before?  Well... this could be your chance! I have written the perfect music video, and I just know that we are going to have a LOT of fun filming together, and we'll be able to remember it for the rest of our lives!  

YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY...

If you choose to put your faith, and hard earned money behind this project, I can't begin to thank you enough! Each dollar will go to good use, and make this album more than I ever dreamed possible! I am a HUGE dreamer, and an even bigger worker, and I know for a fact that you will not be disappointed in what I create! I have all the songs written, the arrangements arranged, recording dates set, and everything ready to go once I hit my goal!

Also anyone who backs  this project with $1 or more will automatically be entered into my Dustin's Diamonds Facebook Fan Group, where you will get access to my P.O. Box, plus a lot of other cool behind the scenes stuff! 

 

I cannot wait to get started making the music for this album! I just know you guys are going to love it just as much as I do! 

Love Dustin 

 

Here is what the CD will look like! (Not necessarily in this order) 

1. Flawless

2. Rain

3. Momma Talks To Jesus

4. Don't Grab Your Gun

5. Hurricane

6. Leila 

7. Never Lookin Back

8. Alice 

9. Strong Love

10. Take The Train 

 

Directly under my introduction video to my Indiegogo campaign is a few pictures and videos for your guy's viewing and listening pleasure! The video's of "Alice" and "Flawless" are what the production of my songs will sound like!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Steve Sherk, and I was born and raised just outside Minneapolis, MN.  Music is my passion, and I love travel.  This demo I'm working on consists of the best 4 songs I've written, and I would love to touch the lives of others through my music.  Support me in this cause and be apart of a change to improve the music that's on the radio there days!

What We Need & What You Get

What's needed is your help and support to get the word out for this project.  The funds raised will go to the process of recording, mixing, master, and getting this CD into a physical format.  Additionally, the music will be available on major Internet radio stations as well as available for download from website such as iTunes and Amazon.

You can get some awesome benefits for contributing! Perks range anywhere from getting a digital download of the demo upon availability to having your own song written just for you.  There's even an opportunity to have your name listed on the demo as an executive producer!

The Impact

Music these days is suffering and desperately needs to be genuine again.  What we need is music that's unformulated and passionate.  This acoustic album will showcase what an honest, intentional, and meaningful music sounds like.

Risks & Challenges

It's hard to get noticed in an oversaturated market.  It's a challenge for good music to get noticed these days.  It's up us to help shift the music industry back to selling art rather than just a product.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, it's no problem! Please just share this link and help get the word out.  Thanks so much, friends!

story:
Help reopen a Pub in Co. Donegal, Ireland.

This Killybegs pub is needed as a live music venue and local watering hole. Previous owners have jumped ship and left the country. Donate the cost of a pint and throw extra money into the tip jar.

All or nothing funding if we don't meet the target you get your money back!

Donate the cost of a pint and throw extra money into the tip jar.All or nothing funding if we don't meet the target you get your money back!

story:
The Death of a Legend

We are the Charles Walker Band and have been together for 16 years, touring for about 10 of those years.  Two weeks ago our Suburban died (engine said "I'm out!") after serving us semi-loyally and we now find our pockets too light to get something else to tour in. 

(This is our old truck...this isn't how it died but it sure looks dramatic!!)

 

The Fam Van to Tour Again

We talked to mechanics and they told us to get a 2010 Honda Odyssey so we won't need to be in the shop every 3 weeks (unless we really miss the mechanics).  So...

  • 90% of the money is going for the van.  We have $2000 from the sale of the dead Suburban (☹️ yeah I know, without an engine people don't like to pay much for vehicles)
  • 5% goes to Indiegogo
  • 30% goes to pay for all the swag you get in perks! 
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will try and find a 2010 Odyssey with higher miles (or maybe just get a camel, they don't break down so easily!)

(The van we hope to purchase after the campaign)

What's in it for Fam?

So if you have gotten this far you may be thinking, what I get from all this? 

  • The van is really for fam.  We use it almost exclusively to tour in to see great folks like you (and we also use it for a changing room and sometimes a hotel room while we are on the road)
  • We are giving you our newly designed t-shirts hoodies, private lessons, and of course, your own private shows (Note: Charles does not twerk....well)
  • Please Note: All rewards will be shipped within 30 days of the campaign ending.  All concerts will be discussed and scheduled after the campaign has ended and will probably be scheduled in 2019.

Why Should You Care? Why Do We Care?

So now the big question is, especially if you don't know us, why should you care? There's lots of great places to invest your money (Arcade, Pizza Hut, Talking Vacuum) so why us? 

  • Our mission is to spread love through the idea of family.  Not in any traditional sense but in the recognition that we are all family and music unites us as one family.  Regardless of if you back us or not, YOU ARE FAMILY and there is nothing you can do about it! (Ok, enough with the heavy, mushy stuff)
 
(If you wonder what we sound like, here you go!)

 

Risks & Challenges

Are we daunted (yes Charles was an English major) by such a task?

  • There is a risk every time you expose yourself and ask for help.  (BTW when I say expose yourself I mean taking a risk not running around naked, but I guess you can if you are at home) . We may come up short, but we have handled everything up to this point so we can handle however this campaign turns out.
  • We recognize the amount is large but we have been reaching out to radio, blogs and individuals to share our campaign.  We will continue to encourage others who have influence (and sometimes may be under the influence) to share.  As Les Brown says, "It's Possible."

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't financially able to contribute right now (we appreciate goat contributions but I don't think we have any room for any more right now) you can still help.  You can:

  • Create a post or share one of our posts from Facebook, Twitter or Instagram
  • Call or text a friend and say, "Hey I have seen this great band from WI and they can't tour to me anymore unless folks support their Indiegogo.  Please check it out"
  • There are great Indiegogo share tools that are easy to use too. Just share the campaign directly.

What if We are Overfunded?

Well, that would be amazing if we were overfunded.  What would we do with 150% or 200% of our goal?

  • It's been over a year since our last album release, so we would begin to plan recording our next album. We would tuck away the money and save it towards studio costs, production, music videos, etc.

Thanks for you time and your support! We love you and can't wait to see you in the Funk Fam Van!

story:
Summary

My name is Mike Turnbull & I am an indie-folk singer-songwriter based in the Lake District, UK. 

I have already achieved so much since my EP release - support for Mel C at the Keswick Mountain Festival, a slot at Settle Gathering, loads of other gigs & appearances (with my double bass player Suzanne Ambrose) in Cumbria, with more supports coming - Tobias Ben Jacob, Reg Meuross and Bella & Polly.

I am now recording a full album with multi instrumentalist Lukas Drinkwater at his 'Everyone Sang Recording' studio in Stroud, Gloucestershire, Uk. 

I am also hoping to enlist the help of Evan Carson & Ciaran Algar (Sam Kelly & the Lost Boys) to add Bodhran & Fiddle respectively, on some of the new songs.

These new songs continue where I left off with my  EP 'Circlet of Gold' - telling stories & weaving my world & yours into glorious acoustic music - this time with more instrumentation.

My project so far is self funded (like my last one).  This is my commitment & belief in my music... but this time I am seeking help of music lovers everywhere to help me complete this project with mastering and duplication.  These last two processes are crucial and would literally put the icing on the already beautifully baked cake we've started!

Please will you help me..?

What I Need & What You Get

I would love to raise around £500.  This will help towards the mastering process & duplication to get the album into a physical being.  It will also help with the final design of the album cover.

  • If you donate, I will personally sign & send you the new CD album and with other perks I can offer other special bundles & events to say a huge thank you and give you a big musical hug!
  • Karma : )  You could donate and simply follow my progress, just for pure karma!
  • What if I don't reach my goal?  Well, any funds will certainly go towards completing the project anyway if i can - although it may take slightly longer - I would certainly owe it to anyone who donates and keep you involved too.
  • If I do achieve my goal? ...and more, It will be awesome & I can complete the project with some fine & well respected musicians, and... certainly use the extra towards creating an official video so I can share it back to you all with a visual feast too!

The Impact

  • Music has always been a part of me, although I'm a late bloomer, I want people who like my music to be a part of what I do too.  So it would mean everything, as well as hopefully making the world a better place in my own little way with my songs for everyone.
  • My EP was so well received and I feel blessed that the songs were unique enough to be heard & liked.  I want to continue the good work I started with my album, but bring you along too if you like.
  • My photos here were taken near where I live - Morecambe Bay - where the sea meets the gateway to the Lake District on the southern edge of Cumbria, UK.  I'd like to take you all there with my music & enjoy the journey too.

Risks & Challenges

It is a risk but I'm gaining a following all the time & If I get there - we all get there... and this album will be for us all, not just me.

Lukas has already done so much and now it's up to me to use a sympathetic and trusted mastering engineer to bring the album alive.  Then all I need to do is finalise the design and duplicate, then get it out there for all to see & hear.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • It's absolutely fine if you can't donate : ) but you can still help!  The modern mantra - share, share, & share again, in any way you can in all your social media.  That would be great.
  • Here on Indiegogo, there are loads of way to do this too, just click away & share.

Thank you so much, and Namaste my friends!
