story:
Short Summary

Academia Tradición Productions LLC and Caballota Records LLC have partnered on this project to raise the necessary funds to produce some great music. Simply put, the funds will go towards covering the cost of producing the 7 remaining songs for Academia Tradición's debut album (expected release date October: 2020), and at least 7 singles to be released by Caballota Records over the same time period. Who are Academia Tradición and Caballota Records? Read on to find out.

Academia Tradición - A Caribbean Music Group

Genres: Salsa, Merengue, Bachata, Bolero, Samba, more to come!

Website: www.academiatradicion.com

YouTube/Spotify/Facebook: Academia Tradición

Instagram: anton.profe.candela

Academia Tradición is a musical project founded by Antonio J. Henríquez García. Henríquez, better known by his stage name "El Profe Candela," is the composer, lead singer, and executive producer for all of the group's songs. Henríquez has a bachelor's degree in economics from Cornell University and a Master of International Affairs from Columbia University, and currently works full-time in the field of due diligence and investigations. Music has always been a true passion for Henríquez. Trained as a classical concert pianist, Henríquez developed juggled his academic and corporate life with a careful study of Latin music's harmonies, styles, and the techniques of its greatest exponents. After writing his first song as a junior at Cornell, Henríquez quickly became a promising songwriter, drawing his inspiration from his knowledge of Latin America's history, culture, politics, challenges, and his own personal experiences in the region.

Caballota Records - Modern Latin Fusion

Genres: Timba, Salsa Shoke, Reggaetón, Bachata, Urbano

Caballota Records LLC was created when both co-founders of the label, Sergio Santizo and Ricardo Gutiérrez saw eye to eye the simple fact, that unfortunately the vast majority of Latin talent will be forever overshadowed in the music industry. Despite the accessibility of technology, Caballota believes that there is amazing talent out there that unfortunately will never reach its audience. Santizo and Gutiérrez are both Latinos of different backgrounds. Gutiérrez of Venezuelan/Colombian origin has been involved in the Latin Music scene all his life, including being a prominent DJ and Dancer in New Jersey. He has Latin music oozing out of his veins. Santizo, of Guatemalan decent grew up in Central NJ, a Rutgers University alum and with an MA in Public Policy, Law & Economics from Universidad Complutence de Madrid and has been in sales in the financial industry and vast experience in global markets. There is no doubt that with all the passion that this duo has, Caballota Records is due to release Music from new talent for the entire world to enjoy.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to cover the costs of these remaining productions, we are looking to raise a total of $5,000. Considering the 5% fee, we are setting a fundraising goal of $5,250. In return for your pledge of confidence, we are offering several perks including receiving the digital download of our musical releases.

The Impact

Both Caballota Records and Academia Tradición are working together to create great Latin music with very talented artists that otherwise would not have an opportunity to showcase their craft on a world stage. We are taking the necessary steps to provide these artists with the tools to produce their musical work and distribute it to listeners worldwide.

Risks & Challenges

Although we do not anticipate major setbacks, music production can be subject to delays. Factors determining the length of this delay include logistical difficulties during recording sessions or in the steps leading to recording arrangements.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Academia Tradición Productions LLC and Caballota Records LLC have partnered on this project to raise the necessary funds to produce some great music. Simply put, the funds will go towards covering the cost of producing the 7 remaining songs for Academia Tradición's debut album (expected release date October: 2020), and at least 7 singles to be released by Caballota Records over the same time period. Who are Academia Tradición and Caballota Records? Read on to find out.
Academia Tradición - A Caribbean Music Group
Genres: Salsa, Merengue, Bachata, Bolero, Samba, more to come!
Website: www.academiatradicion.com
YouTube/Spotify/Facebook: Academia Tradición
Instagram: anton.profe.candela
Academia Tradición is a musical project founded by Antonio J. Henríquez García. Henríquez, better known by his stage name "El Profe Candela," is the composer, lead singer, and executive producer for all of the group's songs. Henríquez has a bachelor's degree in economics from Cornell University and a Master of International Affairs from Columbia University, and currently works full-time in the field of due diligence and investigations. Music has always been a true passion for Henríquez. Trained as a classical concert pianist, Henríquez developed juggled his academic and corporate life with a careful study of Latin music's harmonies, styles, and the techniques of its greatest exponents. After writing his first song as a junior at Cornell, Henríquez quickly became a promising songwriter, drawing his inspiration from his knowledge of Latin America's history, culture, politics, challenges, and his own personal experiences in the region.
Caballota Records - Modern Latin Fusion
Genres: Timba, Salsa Shoke, Reggaetón, Bachata, Urbano
Caballota Records LLC was created when both co-founders of the label, Sergio Santizo and Ricardo Gutiérrez saw eye to eye the simple fact, that unfortunately the vast majority of Latin talent will be forever overshadowed in the music industry. Despite the accessibility of technology, Caballota believes that there is amazing talent out there that unfortunately will never reach its audience. Santizo and Gutiérrez are both Latinos of different backgrounds. Gutiérrez of Venezuelan/Colombian origin has been involved in the Latin Music scene all his life, including being a prominent DJ and Dancer in New Jersey. He has Latin music oozing out of his veins. Santizo, of Guatemalan decent grew up in Central NJ, a Rutgers University alum and with an MA in Public Policy, Law & Economics from Universidad Complutence de Madrid and has been in sales in the financial industry and vast experience in global markets. There is no doubt that with all the passion that this duo has, Caballota Records is due to release Music from new talent for the entire world to enjoy.

What We Need & What You Get
In order to cover the costs of these remaining productions, we are looking to raise a total of $5,000. Considering the 5% fee, we are setting a fundraising goal of $5,250. In return for your pledge of confidence, we are offering several perks including receiving the digital download of our musical releases.

The Impact
Both Caballota Records and Academia Tradición are working together to create great Latin music with very talented artists that otherwise would not have an opportunity to showcase their craft on a world stage. We are taking the necessary steps to provide these artists with the tools to produce their musical work and distribute it to listeners worldwide.

Risks & Challenges
Although we do not anticipate major setbacks, music production can be subject to delays. Factors determining the length of this delay include logistical difficulties during recording sessions or in the steps leading to recording arrangements.

I , Jefferey have not been only waiting many years for this but also have decided the time for it is now. I will chase my dreams, Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Hi!

We're Road Not Taken, and we're a four-piece folk band based near Bristol. We've been playing and performing together since 2014, and released our first EP Back Into Storyland in 2016, but since then we've had a slight lineup change and our sound has really grown and developed. We'd really like to share our new songs and tunes with you with this new, as-yet-untitled, album.

Most of the material we play is traditional, but we also do some of our own songs and the odd arrangement of something a bit more contemporary, and all of these will be on the album. Our sound has been described as having a "hint of menace" (we think it was meant as a compliment!) but also as "songs that sounds as though they've been draped in glittering cobwebs... and that is a very find thing indeed." We prefer the term "melancholy" to "depressing"... but you get the idea!

We're recording this album with the very wonderful Mr Lukas Drinkwater at Polyphonic Recording in Stroud, and we're proud that it will be a completely independent release. We've already started the recording process, which you'll have seen from the release of the first single from the album, The Grey of the Water, which came out a couple of months ago. We're really thrilled with how it's all coming together and we're looking forward to getting it finished and released.

But that feels a long way off at the moment, as it's an expensive process... and that's why we need your help. We hope you'll join us!

What We Need & What You Get

We want to make this the best possible album it can be, so first and foremost, we're giving you the opportunity to pre-order the album and get your hands on it before the official release. There are also a myriad of other lovely perks, including your name in the album sleeve, a cover song of your choice (within reason!) given a Road Not Taken makeover, and even a concert in your very own living room, as well as lots of other little perks. 

Please check out of the rewards and get involved!

The Impact

By backing this campaign, you'll become a hugely important part of the release of the new album. Your support will mean that we can record the album in the studio that we want to use, get it properly mixed and mastered, and get actual CDs made and sent out to you.

We're funding as much as we can ourselves, but we really need your support to make it as good as it can possibly be.

Risks & Challenges

As with any project, there is always the risk that it will run behind and be a little later than planned. We've set ourself strict deadlines in order to make sure it's ready for September, when we plan to go on tour, and we don't foresee a problem. But worst-case scenario is a delay, not a cancellation!

Other Ways You Can Help

We know that some people aren't in a position to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean they can't help. They can encourgage others to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, share on social media and, if all else fails, we need tasty vegan recipes to sustain us in the studio.

Thank You So Much!

story:
What's It All About?

If you believe that music is the universal language  and that the power of music can unite us all...then take a leap of faith and join the We Are Oui Unity Tour. If you are a singer, musician, spoken word artist, use sign language, speaker, choir, group of friends, young or old, any musical style country, classical or blues...You can be a part of this healing.

My name is Kathy Bee and I am an award winning singer/songwriter, musical playwright and an entertainer whose dream is to unite our country and the world through music, including concerts, music videos and the making of the We Are Oui Unity Tour Documentary. My plan is to reach-out and touch the lives of 1 million artist who share the same dream and digitally master performers singing together either the entire We Are Oui song and or at least the We Are Oui lyrics that end the song.  Your performances will  be obtained through your uploaded music and at my We Are Oui Unity Concerts.

It all begins with the 1st step...the one voice...The next step is for you to add your support.  Even if you play the notes along with my acapella rendition or sing in your own style...The plan is to have 1 Million performers performing the song We Are Oui on my new single.

Step 1.  Listen & Learn The Song

WE ARE OUI

                   words, music & vocals by Kathy Bee

DO YOU HEAR THE WIND THAT'S BLOWIN'
CAN YOU CATCH THE BREEZE
EVEN THOUGH IT'S HARD FOR ALL TO PLEASE

YOU'RE STANDING UP TO EMPTY VOICES
WHEN YOU SING YOUR SONG
KNOWING WHAT IS RIGHT AND WHAT IS WRONG

YOU'RE NOT PART OF THIS HYPOCRISY
YOU HAVE DREAMS OF YOUR OWN
DON'T YOU KNOW THAT THIS IS THE WAY IT MUST BE
IT'S BETTER TO BE RIGHT
EVEN IF YOU'VE GOTTA STAND UP ALL ALONE

DO YOU HEAR THE WIND THAT'S BLOWIN'
CAN YOU CATCH THE BREEZE
YOU ARE YOU AND I WE ARE OUI

WE'RE NOT PART OF THIS HYPOCRISY
WE HAVE DREAMS OF OUR OWN
DON'T YOU KNOW THAT THIS IS THE WAY IT MUST BE
IT'S BETTER TO BE RIGHT
EVEN IF WE'VE GOTTA STAND UP ALL ALONE

DO YOU HEAR THE WIND THAT'S BLOWIN'
CAN YOU CATCH THE BREEZE
YOU ARE YOU AND I
YOU ARE YOU AND I
YOU ARE YOU AND I

WE ARE OUI WE ARE OUI WE ARE OUI WE ARE OUI

Step 2.  Choose Your Contribution Level

Step 3.  You Will Receive Instructions 

Once you've determined what type of contribution you want to make, then you will receive instructions on the next step whether it's:

  • Where and how to upload your performance of We Are Oui
  • When the CD & DVD will be released and information about your order
  • Concerts (where they will be held) and your VIP ticket information
  • How to Host a We Are Oui Unity Concert
  • How to become a Sponsor and Sponsorship Opportunities
  • How to become an Angel Supporter

More About Kathy Bee

story:
Short Summary

The 5 songs that will be included on this EP have been in the works over the last year or so and I  have now reached the point where they are ready to be recorded with a full band and released! It has been a long process of writing and recording demos at home but I couldn't be more excited to finally get to the stage where I have a group of songs that are ready to be taken to the next level in the studio. Just to give you a quick taster, one of the tracks that will definitely be included on the EP is called 'We'll Catch the Sun' which took influence from a Noel Gallagher song called 'Alone on the Rope'.

When it comes writing songs, I tend to write my songs on an acoustic guitar and then build around them with a full band once I have a melody to work with. From there, I can add in different riffs and dynamics that all follow and work with the melody. The lyrics tend to be last part of the song for me because I like to see how the song is going before putting words to it. I feel like the music dictates what it is I want to write about once I know if the song is upbeat, sad, melancholy etc.

There are many bands and songwriters that have influenced my music, most notably Noel Gallagher and Richard Ashcroft. Both of these are very melodic in their writing and almost have a melancholy to them which has influenced the way I write. 

All the songs on the EP touch on my own life experiences in some way or another. I try to do this as often as I can as I find it easier to tell a story about things I have experienced, however I try to keep them as open as I possibly can to other meanings. By this I mean so that people who listen can relate to the songs in their own particular way and put their own meanings to them.

I like to keep my music as simple as possible and let the melody stand out. I'm not one for "shredding" on the guitar and playing as quickly and loudly as possible (whilst I do still appreciate that), partly because I can't, but the main reason is melody.  I think this has come from a lot of the music that I listen to and my influences. 

This for me is the beauty of music, how one song can mean something to one person and something completely different to another, while the songwriter knows the original meaning. Sometimes there doesn't even have to be a real meaning or story to a song and the songwriter themselves might not know what it means, but to someone who listens to it, it might mean the absolute world. This is why music, to me, is so fascinating.

All the songs will be recorded with a full band, not acoustic!

Feel free to ask me any questions about this campaign or just come and say hello on my social media

YouTube: Scott Edwards

Facebook / Instagram / Twitter: @IamScottEdwards

Please note: This campaign is running on fixed funding. This means that if the target amount for the campaign isn't reached, you will receive a full refund from Indiegogo and you won't receive the perk you purchased.

 

What We Need & What You Get

As I am sure you will know, recording any sort of music, wether a single or a full album, and then releasing it into the world is not cheap! I have self funded projects in the past but with this being a step up in size, I do need a little bit of help with this one, which is where you come in! All of the money I manage to raise through this crowdfunding campaign will be going towards studio costs as well as plenty of Merch! Everyone loves Merch!

The studio costs are where the main bulk of it will go as to record the EP will take around 5-6 days. On top of this are costs for the additional musicians required to help with the recording.

So as you would expect there are many different perks on offer that you can choose from! These include:

  • A free download of the EP for everyone
  • A signed physical copy of the EP (Without Being Where We Are Now, We Can't Be There)
  • Hand written, signed and framed lyrics
  • Signed Lyric and Photo Books
  • T-Shirts 
  • Mugs (Because everyone needs a new mug)
  • Guitar Picks
  • Badges

Everyone who purchases a perk will also receive a personalised thank you email.

You can also keep up to date with the progress of the EP, on my YouTube Channel (search for Scott Edwards) as I will be Vlogging the whole process from start to finish. There will also be shoutouts on there to people who play a part by purchasing a perk!

Please note: If you purchase a perk from outside of the UK and it requires shipping, eg. a T-Shirt, there will be a small delivery charge.

 

Challenges

As with anything, there are a couple of challenges with the project. But what is life without a good challenge? Everyone loves a good challenge otherwise it would be easy too easy to get what we want. We have to be able to take risks and challenge ourselves. I'm taking a big risk by trying to create a career in music for myself however I would much rather challenge myself and create something I am proud of and passionate about than to not try and never know if I would have been able to do it.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, I completely understand but thank you for taking the time to read through this. There are ways you can still help though :)

You can still help spread the word and bring people into the campaign by sharing and telling your friends and family!

You can do this by using the Indiegogo Sharing Tools :)

Thanks

See you all very soon with some new tunes!!

Scott!

All the songs will be recorded with a full band, not acoustic!
Feel free to ask me any questions about this campaign or just come and say hello on my social media
YouTube: Scott Edwards
Facebook / Instagram / Twitter: @IamScottEdwards
Please note: This campaign is running on fixed funding. This means that if the target amount for the campaign isn't reached, you will receive a full refund from Indiegogo and you won't receive the perk you purchased.
 

What We Need & What You Get
As I am sure you will know, recording any sort of music, wether a single or a full album, and then releasing it into the world is not cheap! I have self funded projects in the past but with this being a step up in size, I do need a little bit of help with this one, which is where you come in! All of the money I manage to raise through this crowdfunding campaign will be going towards studio costs as well as plenty of Merch! Everyone loves Merch!
The studio costs are where the main bulk of it will go as to record the EP will take around 5-6 days. On top of this are costs for the additional musicians required to help with the recording.
So as you would expect there are many different perks on offer that you can choose from! These include:

A free download of the EP for everyone
A signed physical copy of the EP (Without Being Where We Are Now, We Can't Be There)
Hand written, signed and framed lyrics
Signed Lyric and Photo Books
T-Shirts 
Mugs (Because everyone needs a new mug)
Guitar Picks
Badges

Everyone who purchases a perk will also receive a personalised thank you email.
You can also keep up to date with the progress of the EP, on my YouTube Channel (search for Scott Edwards) as I will be Vlogging the whole process from start to finish. There will also be shoutouts on there to people who play a part by purchasing a perk!
Please note: If you purchase a perk from outside of the UK and it requires shipping, eg. a T-Shirt, there will be a small delivery charge.
 

Challenges
As with anything, there are a couple of challenges with the project. But what is life without a good challenge? Everyone loves a good challenge otherwise it would be easy too easy to get what we want. We have to be able to take risks and challenge ourselves. I'm taking a big risk by trying to create a career in music for myself however I would much rather challenge myself and create something I am proud of and passionate about than to not try and never know if I would have been able to do it.
 
Other Ways You Can HelpIf you can't contribute, I completely understand but thank you for taking the time to read through this. There are ways you can still help though :)You can still help spread the word and bring people into the campaign by sharing and telling your friends and family!You can do this by using the Indiegogo Sharing Tools :)ThanksSee you all very soon with some new tunes!!Scott!

story:
I'm an artist, and I write my own songs. 

 

  • I've been making music for years (you can find my first EP "5 Sides" and my recent single "Automatic" online.
  • Too often, I get stuck in the creative process navigating the up front costs of releasing more of my music. 
  • This is the year where I stop doing that, and release idea after idea after idea - resulting ideally in the "Prism" album project, a collection of 7 to 10 new songs.

I'm asking your support to make more music. 

I'm looking for support to make sure producers, engineers, musicians and collaborators are all paid. 

  • Contribute and you'll receive free downloads of all my new music! 
  • If I don't reach my goal, I'll still put every dollar toward the release of new songs - as many as I can!

Risks & Challenges

Sometimes you get trapped by the schedules of the other people you're working with - they all have other projects they are working on. I have a long list of potential musicians and engineers so I don't get stuck / attached to one person or another - this music is getting made, even if I have to adapt my creative plans along the way. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute yourself, please help me spread the word! Every little bit counts.

story:
SoulFool Band Believes in Music and Believes in Love

I Believe in Music I Believe in Love, thats the title of our 10 original song  album :

  • This album is a core statement of what we are believing in. We gonna make this album no matter what! :)
  • We want to express the feeling we have, through blues&gospel that we all love.
  • When you are funding the making of this album, you help us bring that idea to people all around the world.

 

Little Help From My Friends

Music lovers from all across the world:

  • The recordings and the overall production of our album cost more than 4000 euros. So we need your help too to help us pay the studio rent, mixing and mastering as well as promoting it all across the world. 
  • We are all about giving! While you help us create music that everybody can enjoy, you also have the chance to get know our band and to know the album from a personal point of view!
  • If we dont reach our goal, all the money collected will go to the renting studio for mixing and mastering.

Connecting people across the world

We are not a telecommunication company but:

  • If you help us, we can travel more with the album and spread the joy and heartfelt emotions, which is one of the purposes of playin' music.
  • We have been playin' all across Europe as well as China and Africa. So many different cultures, but one thing is always the same:
  • When you look into the people's eyes you see there is the same light!!

Not Easy But Good Work

Living and making music is not an easy thing nowdays. Especially when you want to give people real emotions that they can truly relate to.

  • I have been doing this in the past 12 years and Im learning a lot since, every day. How to open up, how to bring feelings and ideas to people. But I have found myself in blues&gospel where I can express love, enjoyment, sorrow and enlightment. 
  • I want to keep doing that and bring people much more closer. 

Smile or Hug and Spread the Word

If you cannot contribute to our album, no problem:

  • In your daily life just give a smile to one another or hug somebody. It feels goood! :)

And if you feel so, come to one our shows and have fun or just share this page with your friends and family.

Peace and Love! :)

story:
Short Summary

For the connoisseurs of the legendary British rock group QUEEN, rock artist VALENSIA needs no introduction. When Valensia released his remarkable QUEEN TRIBUTE in 2003, he was hailed by the Queen Community, praised for his ability to perfectly recreate the Queen sound. His rendition of My Fairy King has been widely recognized as the only Queen cover which actually surpasses the original. The tribute was praised by Brian May, Eddie Howell (Man From Manhattan), Ian Hunter (Mott The Hoople) for the excellent performances and arrangements.


In 2019, Valensia's record company requested a new Queen Tribute but a clash occurred when Valensia sought out only hidden, obscure and unfinished early Mercury songs, while the record company wanted the greatest hits. The QUEEN III album was halted. Which is what brings us here.

 

Queen in 1974


Valensia's voice indeed is uncanningly similar to the voice of the young Freddie Mercury and, moreover, he has no trouble in perfectly duplicating Brian May's style of guitar playing or John Deacon's bass playing, nor Queen's inimitable harmony vocals. However, Valensia's truly uncanny feature is the gift to compose and arrange in exactly the similar style Queen composed and arranged their music in the seventies.

 

Valensia in 1993, alongside Queen, was one of the very few artists who achieved world-wide success by releasing a complex structured song (GAIA), with a total duration of nearly six minutes in  the fall of 1993.  Selling over 1 million copies, Valensia achieved superstardom in Japan at the age of 22.

 

Why we're here

In 2019 Valensia's record company once again asked for a new Queen Tribute album. But instead of re-recording the greatest hits, Valensia went hunting for the most obscure material Freddie Mercury or any of the other Queen members had written but never released. 
Valensia started recording the Mercury-penned songs "Green", "Vagabond Outcast" and even the mysterious song "F.E.W.A.", of which only parts of the lyrics survived.


Freddie Mercury's letter, mentioning the existence of the song "F.E.W.A."

 

By letting the lyrics dictate how the music might have been, Valensia suggestively reconstructed the unknown song "F.E.W.A. (FEELINGS ENDED, WORN AWAY)" and re-arranged songs like "GREEN", "VAGABOND OUTCAST", "NEW YORK" and even the John Glover Kind-penned "(I DO LIKE TO BE) BESIDE THE SEASIDE", all in the Queen 1974-1977 golden age style. Demos of the pre-Queen band SMILE were also included, such as "STEP ON ME" in a Killer Queen-styled of fashion, as well as Brian May's "APRIL LADY".

 

Valensia's 2019 rendition of Queen's "We Are The Champions"

 

Although Valensia recorded "BOHEMIAN RHAPSODY", "WE ARE THE CHAMPIONS" and "SOMEBODY TO LOVE", the album was canceled in early 2020 because of the lack of hit songs. 
Valensia added Aretha Franklin's "MY PRECIOUS LORD" as a "SOMEBODY TO LOVE" Queen-styled rendition and then halted the project due to the lack of funds, which brings us here: We want to see this album completed and be able to listen to the only artist on Earth who is able to revive the seventies Queen sound, with the actual never heard before Freddie Mercury written or related material.
 

Valensia commencing the recordings for QUEEN III

 

What We Need & What You Get

As QUEEN fans know, the early Queen albums were meticulously crafted, taking months to record. The budgets for albums from the seventies until the early nineties were astonishing, even Valensia holds the record with his second album "K.O.S.M.O.S.", costing over a quarter of a million euros. 


The VALENSIA Far East Tour 1996


In the digital era, obviously it has become much cheaper to record albums, and with Valensia owning his own studio any album now can be completed for about ten to fifteen thousand euros, which is only the mixing and mastering of the album.


This album will be called QUEEN III, as it literally revives the QUEEN II sound, using the most obscure, forgotten and barely audible recordings of a young Freddie Mercury and his bands "IBEX" and "Wreckage", or Brian May and Roger Taylor's pre-Queen band "Smile". 
This means the album will sound as if it could have been the follow-up album of QUEEN II; the era which most Queen fans love most.

 

The Impact

And for most Queen fans the thought of having an album filled with completely arranged songs, sounding like the early Queen AND mostly written by Queen, a very tantalizing thought. Especially knowing the sound of the harmony vocals, the daring, complex arrangements and the pompous productions of those days are a thing of the past. 

 

The Queen III album sleeve


Queen fans are well aware of Valensia's ability to breathe the authentic life into the songs, which makes this album a spine-chilling experience for anyone who is addicted to the seventies Queen sound: Valensia will repeat what he did in 2003 with his amazing Queen Tribute but now with unknown Queen songs. 

 

Risks & Challenges

The challenges aren't a factor: we all know Valensia is undoubtedly one of the most gifted and talented artists in this genre. The risk is not getting the funding to finish the production, meaning the mixing and mastering. Not reaching our target means we can't produce the album. Of course, with your support, we will be able to finish production of this masterpiece, which will be the most discussed Queen related music production when available.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help to get the word out and make some noise about the Queen III campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.

We're counting on the support of the regal Queen fans to make this album a huge success! 
Promoting this campaign will be rewarded, as promotion is equally important as supporting this project! 

We hope to be able to bring you an album which seems to have been made about 40 years ago, and the closest thing to the legendary rock band QUEEN.
As close as it gets!

 

More Videos & Teasers of the Perks:

If you want to know more about the Special Perks here are some examples covers, tracklist, videos, etc (on 3D animations). DO NOT waste more time, only here you can get Exclusive Limited items & Signed for your Collection... for a VERY LIMITED time!

 

01. "VALENSIA'S QUEEN III" ALBUM (CD Teaser) :

 

 
 
 
02. "VALENSIA'S QUEEN III" ALBUM (LP-VINYL LIMITED/NUMBERED/SIGNED):
 

 

 

03. "THE PHANTOM OF THE OPERA ALBUM" (THE BEST  OF VALENSIA - QUEEN'S STYLE) (CD LIMITED/NUMBERED BLACK VINYL-CD STYLE + PLUS EXCLUSIVES TRACKS):

 

 

 

04. "QUEEN TRIBUTE" (CD LIMITED/NUMBERED WITH EXCLUSIVES BONUS TRACK, BLACK VINYL-CD STYLE): 

 

 

 

 

05. "EDEN AND THE SECOND SERPENT" + "SECREAT ALBUM" (CD LIMITED/NUMBERED/SIGNED - BLACK VINYL-CD STYLE): 

 

 
 
 
06. "7EVE7" (CD LIMITED/NUMBERED - BLACK VINYL-CD STYLE, PLUS EXCLUSIVES TRACKS ON CD):
 

 

 

 

07. "VALENSIA THE VIDEO COLLECTION" (DVD LIMITED/NUMBERED/SIGNED):
 
 
 
 
08. VALENSIA'S QUEEN III  "MEGA DELUXE EDITION" 07 CD's (02 EXCLUSIVES CD's) + 02 DVD'S (VIDEOCLIPS + RARITIES) + 20 DIGITAL ALBUMS (KARAOKE/VOX/ALBUMS) + PHOTO POSTAL + SPECIAL GIFTS + ONLINE LIVE CONCERT 
(LIMITED/NUMBERED/SIGNED), ONLY 50!
 

 

 

SOON MORE TEASER!..

 

Do you want more Special Editions on CDs/Perks?

We can propose you to make some EXTRA Exclusive, Limited, Numbered, Signed Editions of some CD's (Black Vinyl-CD Style) of the following albums:

 

  • 2CD’s: "Queen III" (KARAOKE Versions / ISOLATED VOCALS Versions).
  • 2CD’s: "Queen Tribute" (KARAOKE Versions / ISOLATED VOCALS Versions).
  • 2CD’s: "The Blue Album” (KARAOKE Versions / ISOLATED VOCALS Versions).
  • 2CD’s: "Gaia III-Aglaea” (KARAOKEVersions / ISOLATED VOCALS Versions).
  • 2CD’s: "7EVE7” (KARAOKE Versions / ISOLATED VOCALS Versions).
  • 2CD’s: "Gaia II.0" + “Gaia II.0 Gold" + "Gaia II.0 Silver" (Album  II.0 + KARAOKE + ISOLATED VOCALS). A little Test Video of this Great Album, BUT ONLY IF YOU WANT IT!

 

 
 

But we must have a minimum of 50-60 real interested Fans, who commit to ordering, and we will add it as new perks in this campaign. To give us your opinion you can contact us directly to The COMMENTS Section or our email contact!

story:
THE NIGHT THIEF LIMITED EDITION Single "My Love Is Whole" Featuring A Remix By Designer Drugs Pressed On Vinyl And Cassette

Why?

Amazing first question. But also the easiest to answer: We want to create something collectible to signify the beginning of this new project and we want EVERYONE to have and hold a copy. There are those of you, like us, that in this brave new digital world maintain a special place in your hearts for the tangible. 

So we come to you, theoretical hats in theoretical hands, with this idea that will provide a limited edition run of something that you helped create.

All perks will be shipped off to ya within a month of the auction's end, and if we don't raise enough moolah, you get it back so rest easy, and spend generously!

What We Need / What You Get

So we need to raise a grand total of $3,000 that will be spent on:

  • Final mixing and mastering of "My Love Is Whole" and remixxes.
  • Vinyl pressing and reproduction and packaging.
Depending on how much you can help out, you will be blessed with one, all, or any combination of the following:
  • LIMITED 12" Vinyl Remixx Single of "My Love Is Whole"
  • Cassingle (remember those??) of "My Love Is Whole"
  • THE NIGHT THIEF Super Soft Shirt
  • THE NIGHT THIEF Not So Soft Vinyl Stickers
  • Download of "My Love Is Whole" and All Three Remixxes

Here are some details about the incentives: The 12" records will be pressed on multi-color 150g virgin vinyl, and come in a hand numbered, full-color jacket, so hurry up and grab a copy of our very first release!! The 4- song vinyl will include "My Love Is Whole" plus remixes by Designer Drugs, Oxix52, and Dallas Campbell. The cassingles will also come shrink-wrapped in a full color sleeve. We will be screening on super-soft Belle & Canvas short-sleeved crew neck shirts. Stickers will feature THE NIGHT THIEF logo and look awesome on anything from car-bumpers to trapper-keepers.

Check out the new music: https://soundcloud.com/thenightthief

Here is the cover art for the 12"... The cassette cover is a variation of this..

Here is some weird dude sporting a mock-up of the shirt design (bling sold separately...)

Here's one sticker design..

And here's the other..

Not Able To Help Right Now?

Totally understandable, but your voice is help enough for us. Send this campaign out to those you think would be interested, or feel free to contact us with an avenue you think we should use to promote.

So, that's pretty much it. If you wanna have, hold and hear some neat stuff, help us reach our goal and let's get this party started!


www.thenightthiefband.com

Here are some details about the incentives: The 12" records will be pressed on multi-color 150g virgin vinyl, and come in a hand numbered, full-color jacket, so hurry up and grab a copy of our very first release!! The 4- song vinyl will include "My Love Is Whole" plus remixes by Designer Drugs, Oxix52, and Dallas Campbell. The cassingles will also come shrink-wrapped in a full color sleeve. We will be screening on super-soft Belle & Canvas short-sleeved crew neck shirts. Stickers will feature THE NIGHT THIEF logo and look awesome on anything from car-bumpers to trapper-keepers.
Check out the new music: https://soundcloud.com/thenightthief
Here is the cover art for the 12"... The cassette cover is a variation of this..

Here is some weird dude sporting a mock-up of the shirt design (bling sold separately...)

Here's one sticker design..

And here's the other..


Not Able To Help Right Now?
Totally understandable, but your voice is help enough for us. Send this campaign out to those you think would be interested, or feel free to contact us with an avenue you think we should use to promote.
So, that's pretty much it. If you wanna have, hold and hear some neat stuff, help us reach our goal and let's get this party started!




www.thenightthiefband.com

story:
“I am dictated enough by my record company to last me a million years.” – Marvin Gaye

Great Guys Records is an independent record label conceived in 2013, with a simple mission: to help amazing bands create music without having to worry about the stress of production costs.

There is a crisis in the modern-day music industry. People don’t bother buying physical copies of music anymore. It may be convenient to hold millions of songs in your pocket through Spotify, but what can compare to the way you lit up when you saved up for your first (CD/Tape/8-Track/Record)?

There is something special about making a physical connection with a piece of music. Seeing the consideration the band put into every detail of the piece of art that is an album, setting the needle on the record and hearing it crackle and pop, reading the lyrics that accompany the music and getting lost in the soundscape. Music is not just a commodity, it is a form of art that deserves as much respect and appreciation as a painting. At Great Guys Records, we care about this connection with music and are passionate about keeping this experience alive for the future of music.

The reality is that musicians must make money to continue to bring us their music. Streaming services have cut artists like our bands short and they need to sell physical copies of music along with other merchandise to make any profit from their art.

The best way to support your favorite bands is to buy their music.

The reality is records are incredibly expensive to make. This is THOUSANDS of dollars that our bands don’t have, leaving them without the ability to record or distribute new music.

Many bands have to turn to record labels to fund their production because of these high costs. However, a record label will often hire producers, engineers and additional personnel to ‘shape’ a band and make them marketable.

And here is where Great Guys Records is different: we want to stay out of the way of the creative process of the bands and simply facilitate the production, marketing and distribution of the incredible music our artists have to offer.

We need people like you to contribute to help us support these artists.


Our goal is $6000 to help jump start these artists with their new albums. While this is only a fraction of the amount we need for our six bands, this amount will hugely assist the process.


  • Recording the album: Sound engineers cost >$25/hr, and albums often take 40+ hours to record, with an additional 20+ hours for mixing and mastering. It is possible to self-record, but this often comes at the cost of sacrificing audio and production quality. We want our artists to have the best sounding package possible.

  • Producing the package: For each band, 1000 CDs will cost $1200 and 200 12” vinyl records will be another $1000. Multiply this by the 6 bands we have on our roster and you have $13,200. This is already over twice what we are trying to raise.

  • A marketing budget: Promotion is essential for any band that wants to push beyond their local bars and house shows. Thanks to the internet, it is possible to reach a much wider audience much faster than before, but we still need to create promotional posters, websites, and ad campaigns for all of our artists. We have driven this cost down through an extensive network of friends, but this still typically amounts to about $500 per album per band.

  • Paying for our E-Distribution:  Again, the internet is a powerful tool for music these days. However, it is often expensive to utilize the resources we have at our fingertips.  In order to have our artists’ music on the apps/websites you love, we have to pay $80 a year to have our catalogue uploaded to Spotify, Google Play, Amazon, etc.  There are also countless additional fees to ensure our artists receive the royalties and rights they deserve through ASCAP/BMI and other agencies.


By investing this money in our label, you are part of a gift that keeps on giving: a band can often recoup triple what they invested in an album and use the proceeds to fund their next album.

Combined, our artists have already independently sold over 5,000 CDs, so it is obvious that their music has been popular with the audiences they’ve been able to reach and all they need is an extra push.

Great Guys Records wants to start a revolution in the way music is treated.

In 2015, we hope to release albums by ALL of the artists on our roster!

Every cent you contribute goes straight to our artists to help fund and promote their releases.

For helping our bands accomplish their goal of putting out new, exciting music, we have several reward packages put together for you so you can reap the benefits of your generous gift. We really hope you enjoy your gifts as much as we enjoy creating music for you to listen to.

Here’s the kicker: we’re not going to frown upon you if you don’t buy the special edition T-shirt, poster, vinyl, and super secret live cover of Party in the USA package – in fact, all of this music, once created, will be available on Spotify, Youtube, Google Play, Amazon, and we even encourage you to pirate, torrent, and download it to share with your friends. The music comes first, so any way you hear it is good with us!


Great Guys Records is a community, not a business. It is a community of artists, art lovers, and visionaries. We care about our musicians and their music because they are our friends; we have a strong sense of camaraderie, pride and respect for the work that we do. With that being said, the greatest risk we face is not being able to fund our artists’ music. Our bands are not right on the brink of stardom - these are bands that work hard every single day, barely making rent, begging to have their voices heard.

The challenges we face on a day-to-day basis are plentiful. How can we ensure our artists grow? What can we do to help them? Where do they need to be? How can we help them get there?  The root of these issues lies in a lack of funding.  How can we promote their album when they can't afford to print it? How can we distribute their music if they can't afford to pay their registrations?  How will people ever hear about these incredibly talented bands if they are forever lost in a sea of artists who are better funded and better promoted?  The answer is you. You can change these artists’ lives by opening this new chapter with us.  Be a Great Guy - it's time for new music for the right reasons!

SHARE THIS PAGE    SHARE OUR ARTISTS’ MUSIC

TELL A FRIEND           BUY THE ALBUMS

LIKE OUR SOCIAL MEDIA PAGES

See! 

It's really easy to lend a hand in one way or another, and it goes a lot further than you may think!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Sonnenklar!

Have you ever written a song for yourself?

Celebrating your life, that you have gone through all the heaps of crap, the deepest shadows, and transformed into a radiant being with the sunshine in your heart?

Well, I did.

And that is what the title track "Sonnenklar" is all about. If you just keep following your dream, miracles happen.

And I know that you can do that, too! That is why the second track is called "Gemeinsam", which means "together". Together we are unstoppable and we can achieve anything.

Even though I am the creator of all the music that you can hear on this 6-track album, it would not have been possible to create this without my friends and family. Thank You!

The album "Sonnenklar" is probably the first German Rock Album on the planet that is recorded in 432Hz, aligned with Cosmic Healing Frequencies.

Available on iTunes, Spotify, Amazon & more

And ready to get on your CD!

story:
The Low Down

Idyltime formed in the saturated hillsides of Coos County, Oregon, but fate brought Beth and Tate Mason to sunny Boise, Idaho in 2011. Shortly thereafter they teamed up with Ava Honey and Dave Daley to create an original sound based on timeless musical themes. Since the release of Rimrock County (2016), Idyltime has been focused on living life to its fullest, developing their sound, and writing music. Want to hear the latest? You can help make it happen! With your support, Idyltime will release their 3rd full length album (second with the current lineup). Thank you for supporting original, independent music! 

Here's where your contribution goes...

  • Studio time
  • Mixing & mastering
  • CD production
  • Distribution
  • Promotion

Your Impact

Your contribution is absolutely essential to making this project happen. Without funding, these songs will live and die in anonymity. But you can help etch them into the stone-face of time. In our current age of streaming (artist take: $.0029 / stream), it is extremely difficult for musicians to recover the cost of making an album. But crowdfunding provides an avenue to get these projects off the ground! With your contribution, this album will be there for you, however you digest your music.

Anticipated Timeline

Crowdfund: April

Record: May

Mix / Master: June / July

Release: Late Summer, 2019 

Risks & Challenges

Health problems, graduate school, children, grand-children, full-time work, the daily grind... there are so many reasons why we're too busy to make a new album, right? Wrong. Music runs through it all- life is reflected in the songs. It's time to send our next batch of music into the world.  

Pre-order our CD and you will love it. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute at this time? Share this campaign and get the word out!

story:
The Hand Shake

What's up friends and future friends! Welcome to my first crowdfunding campaign EVER! 

My name is Tyler Alexis. I’m a singer/songwriter in Los Angeles, California, and I’m ready to record my debut album!

Growing Up a Pale Child of the Sun...

My mom said I was singing before I was talking. I remember dancing around my room, hairbrush in hand, pretending I was on stage performing in front of thousands of people. However, being from LA, I never wanted to be the cliché "starving artist trying to make it big." After incessantly searching to find an alternative career to music, I realized that I couldn't ignore my passion.

The Tough Conversation...

I’ve been writing songs for years. During college, I performed at coffee shops and open mics. However, I constantly found myself stuck in this musical "Catch 22." It wasn’t until about 2 ½ years ago, that I stopped allowing my excuses to keep me from moving forward musically. It was one of the most difficult conversations I’ve had with myself, but honestly, I'm so much happier now.

The more I allow this DIY musician life to consume me, the more insatiable I become. Over the last 2 ½ years, I have made leaps and bounds in my career. I have managed to form a band, recorded a single, performed at a multitude of venues in LA (including the famed Viper Room), performed internationally, created my own merch, and now recording my first album. Which brings me to why we’re here!

The Album

As a child of divorce and struggling with a learning disability, I turned to music as a way of healing and to express what I had difficulty putting into words. Now I hope that my music brings the same comfort and encouragement to others to persevere through their own hardships. I aspire to empower others through transparency, hard work, and music. This is why I decided to name my debut album INTREPID; which means fearless, adventurous, or "very brave and willing to risk being in dangerous situations." Intrepid encapsulates what life pushes and molds us to be. Most of the songs on this album, hash through some of my own life experiences that have shaped me into becoming more "intrepid." 

INTREPID features songs with a mix of topics and styles. "Neglected," is a song about coming to terms with being mistreated and learning to put your own mental health first. "Nightmares," is a song that details an incredibly difficult journey towards self-reliance. "Black Coffee & Cigarettes" is a bluesy, fanciful scenario about a chance interaction in a coffee shop. "Songbird" is a light-hearted, lullaby. I've poured my heart and soul into these songs and I'm so excited to share them with you! This album has been 6 years in the making and I sincerely hope that you find the solace and inspiration to be more INTREPID. 

The $ Breakdown

Our goal: $11,000. This covers the cost of:​

  • Studio time
  • Studio musicians
  • Mixing and mastering
  • CDs and distribution costs
  • Platform fees
  • Perk costs
  • Marketing
  • Contingency buffer 

The Cool Stuff

My team and I have put together some awesome perks and we're super excited for you to get them! 

Physical Perks: T-shirts, posters, stickers, CDs, and even autographed photos (check out the autograph package). 

Experience Perks: Bring a friend for a Brunch and Jam session with the band. Sit in on a day of recording and see how things work Behind the Scenes. Or have your very own Private Performance. (See the perk descriptions for more information)

Every dollar raised goes toward the album, which is where you come in. We need your support financially.

Additionally, every backer of this project at the perk level of $10 or above, will get a digital copy of the finished album. Anyone who contributes $50 or more, will also receive a “Special Thanks” mention in the album booklet. 

What If We Don't Succeed???

If we don't reach our goal, your money will stay in your bank account. Nothing is withdrawn until after the project is 100% funded and the deadline is met (October 4th). This also means, that if we DO NOT reach the goal, there will be no album and no merch. So, please PLEASE help in whatever way you can.

Your $ Impact

Your contribution will help us create some sweet merchandise and an awesome album! All of this is seriously not possible without your help. This album has been a dream of mine for years, so you're making dreams come true. 

I believe that music provides both connection and emotional support to those who need it. However, not every artist can afford to record and distribute their art to help those people who need it. Your contribution will allow us to make that connection. I am humbled and thankful.

Challenges

Having never recorded a studio album or run a crowdfunding campaign before, I am both excited and incredibly nervous. (I honestly haven't slept properly in days). There's always a chance of running into complications, such as not reaching our goal, a song taking longer to record than planned, sickness, scheduling conflicts, or any other number of unplanned obstacles. However, I am no stranger to obstacles.

My team and I have put so much time and energy into creating what we hope will be a successful campaign. During the recording, I will be surrounded by some of the most creative and competent musicians and producers that I know. We will be teaming up with CD Baby for production and worldwide distribution. So, no matter what the hurdles are, I am confident that our hard work and passionate drive will help us push through and create a successful album, one step at a time.

Don't Have the Funds to Help?

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
  • Donate $1 to the tip jar.
  • Remember to share this campaign page using Indiegogo's share tools at the top!

Let's do this!

story:
RECORDING OF A LIVE DVD

I come from a small European country called Croatia. When I was 8 years old, just as I was starting primary school, I absolutely fell in love with the guitar. After finishing secondary school, I discovered jazz music, and went to study jazz and composition in Klagenfurt, Austria.

Since graduation, I have released 5 studio albums in different musical styles: heavy metal, jazz, acid jazz… All of this I financed from my own pocket so people would really get to know who I am and what I’m capable of.

At this moment I have a chance to play a concert in Croatia’s biggest concert hall “Lisinski”, which makes all the effort from all these years totally worth it. It’s a feeling that just can’t be put into words. I would be thrilled to record it on a live DVD album!

1.) If you help me with 10 dollars, you get my last album “Beauty of your soul”

2.) If you help me with more you can have the live recording and a ticket for my concert so you can be a part of it

3.) If you can’t help me with money, you can still help a lot by sharing my post on facebook, twitter, and other internet platforms

Any kind of help is well appreciated, and I hope you will get the DVD when it’s finished!

THX A LOT TO EVERYONE :)  STAY HAPPY AND POSITIVE!
story_txt:
RECORDING OF A LIVE DVD
I come from a small European country called Croatia. When I was 8 years old, just as I was starting primary school, I absolutely fell in love with the guitar. After finishing secondary school, I discovered jazz music, and went to study jazz and composition in Klagenfurt, Austria.
Since graduation, I have released 5 studio albums in different musical styles: heavy metal, jazz, acid jazz… All of this I financed from my own pocket so people would really get to know who I am and what I’m capable of.
At this moment I have a chance to play a concert in Croatia’s biggest concert hall “Lisinski”, which makes all the effort from all these years totally worth it. It’s a feeling that just can’t be put into words. I would be thrilled to record it on a live DVD album!
1.) If you help me with 10 dollars, you get my last album “Beauty of your soul”
2.) If you help me with more you can have the live recording and a ticket for my concert so you can be a part of it
3.) If you can’t help me with money, you can still help a lot by sharing my post on facebook, twitter, and other internet platforms
Any kind of help is well appreciated, and I hope you will get the DVD when it’s finished!
THX A LOT TO EVERYONE :)  STAY HAPPY AND POSITIVE!

story:
Overview

My name is Choyce Schwartz and I am a singer-songwriter from Long Branch, NJ. I am currently working on my upcoming release, and looking to raise money to make a dynamic music video. I have attended performing arts schools for over 15 years, including The University of the Arts School of Music. I began songwriting and producing for artists when I was 19 years old. I've made some success working with popular artists, such as Eric Bellinger, but being a recording artist is my true passion. Last year was the year that I established a solo career of my own.

My music video embraces the idea of women ruling as it is related to Marvel’s fixation of female superheroes and female villains. My goal is to create a parallel world where women embrace their dominance and manifest their own power, whether for the use of good or evil.  Within this diverse concept, I want to bring people back to the early 2000s, and allow viewers to  experience this nostalgic era while associating my music video with new memories. During the creation process to this vision, I have integrated themes of action, using the movies Fast and Furious: Tokyo Drift and Rush Hour to capture a world of thrill, high-risks, heists, fast cars, and of course, beautiful women.

In a thrilling alternate universe of action, De Royce and I find ourselves falling into the hands of "dangerous" women that just may bring us to our demise. The up-tempo song, sonically produced by OD Beats, was inspired by Marvel and The Fast Saga, highlighting the media franchise's ability to captivate viewers visually and musically. I have a very clear idea of the world I want to create around my music video, and its aesthetic. I would be so grateful for any and every contribution I am able to get in order to bring my vision to life. 

I will use every penny of the funds to pay for the video and promotion for the video.  Even if I am unable to reach my goal of $500, I will still use whatever money I raised towards the video to make this video as successful as it can be. I need this amount of money in order to make the quality of the video I’ve envisioned, and to reach a vast audience. 

  I am very grateful for any contributions I receive and appreciate the support! Aside from donations, sharing this project and my music will help me more than you know!

story:
"As a new fan, and admirer of Pauli’s passion as an artist, Dottore I is a recommended listen." - Metal Nation, USA https://metalnation.com/album-review-agarwaen-d...

"Conclusion 10 out of 10: Fans of hard, demanding and honest Metal, should not miss this hammer disc" - She-wolf.eu, Germany http://she-wolf.eu/agarwaen-dottore-i-horror-me...

"Staff pick #1 album of the year 2019" - Metal Nation, USA https://metalnation.com/staff-picks-top-hard-ro...

"The entire album is excellent, and all the songs can satisfy every extreme Metal fan that listen to “Dottore I”. 9/10 Almost perfect!" - Metal Temple, Israel, http://www.metal-temple.com/site/catalogues/ent... 

Short Summary

Hello, I am Vryko from Kouvola, Finland. Agarwaen was originally formed in 2005 as "Shathanas" as folk in Lapland would pronounce it. We started as Christmas Black metal, but shortly after changed our name to Agarwaen and recorded "Vrykolakas" Ep and started to make Horror themed metal. I've been waiting to film promotion video since early of this year, but apparently COVID-19 ruined my plans and now it's snowing in here, IN MID MAY!!!

  • We are here to getting funded for second album "Dottore II"
  • These days it's not enough to make good music, you'll have to spend massive amount of your own money and effort to get even noticed by the right people.
  • As an independent artist I can decide myself of what kind of music I'll do. There won't be any "feat. pitbull" in my songs! Mr. worldwide...We want to stay real for our fans!! 

What We Need & What You Get

  • 20.000€ You will get two more albums and two more music videos and much more!!!
  • 5.000€ You will get music video
  • 3.000€ You will get second album "Dottore II" 
  • 1.000€ We will get funded for printing CDs & T-shirts

The Impact

  • You will help small independent artist to get bigger and produce even better quality music and help us to get on tour some day!!
  • You will motivate us to make more music!
  • You will not only support us, but also many other small independent artists around the world who are working with us!! Graphic designers, video designers, promo photo shooters, etc.! We like to use artists globally!

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks. The Album will be released anyway and is already being printed. Everything will be delivered on time. Challenge is to get sufficient amount of funds so we could start to record "Dottore II" soon. Recording and producing an album costs (sorry my French) S***loads of money!!! O_O 

Other Ways You Can Help

Next best thing beside the contribution is to support us in social media! Share our music, review our album!! Let everybody know about us!! JOIN THE CAUSE!!!

‡JOIN THE WAY OF DOTTORE‡

  • Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Agarwaenband/
  • Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/agarwaen_official/
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/AgarwaenO
  • Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgmvJRg8-O0mYQ...
  • Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/1vccpgnV9WAXZJ6...

And that's all there is to it! Oh, and here is the city that I am from! What a lovely summer city it is!! It's been even voted as the ugliest city in Finland!! You ever dare to come here I'll promise to be your personal tour guide!!

story:
WHO WE ARE

We are Black Therapy, a melodic death metal band from Roma, Italy, established in 2010.

 

 

We released our first album in 2013, followed by an EP containing our version of Mad World which has been a fan favourite and a constant in our live shows ever since.

In december 2016, we released our second full length album “In The Embrace Of Sorrow, I Smile” via german label Apostasy Records.

 

We went on tour to promote this album in september/october 2017 supporting Wintersun across Europe. We did a second european run in april/may 2018, this time supporting Dark Tranquillity and Equilibrium.

 

We signed a deal with swedish label Black Lion Records and released our third full length “Echoes Of Dying Memories” in 2019.

 

WHAT WE WANT TO DO

 

Due to the Covid-19 emergency, we can't go on the road again, but we want to give our fans a special livestream performance. Unfortunately, it is expensive to shoot a live concert in high quality and we need your help to cover the expenses. The concert will happen in July.

 

We estimated that we can cover all the costs with 1400 eur.


PERKS

You can choose among different rewards for helping us. You can choose to just get the digital ticket, but you can also get the ticket and some of our CDs and Tshirts. 

And If you can't contribute, you can help us by spreading the word!

story:
Homma pähkinänkuoressa

  • Hei, olen Miikka Joensuusta! Olen itseoppinut äänituottaja, muusikko, mentori ja yleisen taustatyön tekijä. Olen tehnyt ja nauhoittanut rap-musiikkia jo 17 -vuoden ajan ja minulla on hyvä käsitys siitä mitä teen ja taitoni alalta ovat monipuoliset.
  • Olen juuri perustanut toiminimen ja aloittamassa äänistudiotoimintaa. Tarvitsisin apua alkuun. Haen joukkorahoitusta, koska minulla on hyvin rajallinen pääoma toiminnan aloittamiseen.
  • Osallistumalla autat minua pyöräyttämään toimintani alkuun ja tuomaan panokseni kehittämään Pohjois-Karjalaista urbaanin musiikin kulttuuria monella tasolla. Asennoidun intohimoisesti työhöni ja kampanjan tuoman avun myötä pääset kuulemaan entistä tasokkaampia julkaisuja paikallisilta artisteilta.

Mitä tarvitsen & mitä saat

  • Tarvitsen 600€ siirrettävän mikkikopin hankkimiseen. Muut tarvittavat laitteet toiminnan aloittamiseen minulta jo löytyy. Kyseessä on t.akustikin Vocal Booth -malli, jonka ostan käytettynä Thomannilta. Vaihtoehtoisesti jos tekijä ja materiaalit löytyvät läheltä ja ilman suurta vaivaa niin saatan myös teetättää vastaavanlaisen ja laatuisen kopin.
  • Voit lahjoittaa minkä vain sinulle sopivan summan, tai sitten vain jakaa kampanjalinkkiä, siitäkin on iso apu :)
  • Kun lahjoitat, saat halutessasi etuna studioaikaa, henkilökohtaista artistisparrausta, miksaus-/masterointipalveluja tai markkinointi-/brändäysapua.
  • Jos kampanjan tavoite ei täyty, käytän silti kaiken saamani lahjoituksen mikkikopin hankkimiseen ja hankin puuttuvan osan summasta itse.

Vaikutukset

  • Lahjoituksesi auttaa minua rikastamaan paikallista urbaanin musiikin kulttuuria. 
  • Minulla on takanani useita onnistuneita projekteja paikallisten artistien kanssa. Esimerkkejä julkaisuista joita olen nauhoittanut, ollut mukana tuottamassa tai joiden tekemisessä olen auttanut muulla tapaa : Murtojoki - Arvo (2018), Diego - Mieli (2018),  Nuori Jupe (useita kappaleita), Sige & Hanski (useita kappaleita), Deadline (useita kappaleita)...

Muita tapoja auttaa

Jos sinulla ei ole varaa tehdä lahjoitusta

  • Pystyt auttamaan myös laittamalla sanan kiertämään ja jakamalla tätä indiegogo -kampanjaa.

story:
Soul Nectar

Hello fellow soul brother and/or sister, 
​I have created a music album titled "Soul Nectar" which expresses and lays the foundation for starting a non-profit organization that is dedicated to protecting and preserving wildlife habitat and the Earths natural resources (without the plant and animal kingdom, humans are nothing).
​
The music and lyrics are uplifting, inspiring, and devotional. This musical expression is wanting to be released to the public and I need your support!​

Sample Track: 

https://soundcloud.com/user-333502799/govindam-adi-purusham

What I Need:

Post production tracking, mixing, and mastering by a professional audio engineer

Estimated total: $1,500 - 2,000

 

The Impact:

 

100% of earnings on this album will be dedicated to the non-profit organization (also called Soul Nectar) which is the brand line of many health products (superfood snacks, plant-based nutrition, and herbal bath/body products) created to increase the quality and longevity of all living systems (plants, animals, people). Each product of Soul Nectar will be dedicated to a specific cause (e.g. Soul Nectar vegan ice cream will support cow protection, Soul Nectar drinks will clean the polluted waters, etc.). 

 

The Challenge:

I need help spreading Soul Nectar (the album and non-profit) to the public so we can have a better impact at sustaining Earth, the plants, animals, and our families! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

If your not able to contribute, feel free to share this campaign with your friends to help support the cause. 
​
May your soul be blessed with nectar,
Miles Tyson aka Jivanamrita (Soul Nectar)

story:
CFLX-La radio communautaire fête ses 30 ans!

Votre contribution:

Votre contribution est vitale afin que cette radio demeure active et impliquée dans son milieu et continue de soutenir  sa communauté, d'être partenaire du milieu des affaires  et  de faire rayonner les artistes et les artisans de l'Estrie.   

Qui sommes-nous?

CFLX est un organisme sans but lucratif, une radio avantageusement située dans le périmètre du centre-ville de Sherbrooke, au cœur de l’action communautaire, commerciale et touristique.

CFLX c’est une petite équipe d'employés permanents, regroupant  plus de quarante bénévoles et passionnés épaulés par un conseil d’administration qui veille à développer et offrir un produit radiophonique original et de qualité. La station s’assure de la promotion de la culture francophone, le développement des liens entre les différentes communautés et de la  collective.

CFLX c’est une programmation musicale très variée : du jazz, de la musique classique, de la chanson française, du blues, du country, de la musique émergeante et d’avant garde et bien d'autres. CFLX a aussi un regard pertinent sur  l’information, la culture, le sport, les préoccupations sociales et les initiatives communautaires.

CFLX est diffusée avec une puissance de 1000 watts et entendue sur la fréquence 95,5 dans un rayon  de soixante kilomètres autour de Sherbrooke, couvrant plusieurs villes de la région estrienne dont :

Ascot Corner, Birchton, Bromptonville, Bulwer, Compton, Cookshire, Deauville, East Angus, Eaton, Fleurimont, Huntinville, Johnville, Lennoxville, Magog, Martinville, Moes River, North-Hatley, Rock Forest,Saint-Élie-d’Orford, Sherbrooke 

Historique:

1982 - CFLX est née d’une initiative conjointe entre l’Association générale des étudiants en génie (A.G.E.G) et l’Association générale des étudiants en sciences (A.G.E.S.) de l’Université de Sherbrooke et diffuse à ce moment sur la fréquence 98,1.

1984 - Le ministère des Communications accorde le financement de la nouvelle antenne. Dans l’édifice du vieil Hôtel Magog de la rue Dufferin à Sherbrooke débutent les travaux d’aménagement des futurs studios. Dès l’automne, CFLX diffuse sur les ondes du 95,5.

Les années 1990 seront marquées par la détermination des nombreux bénévoles qui ont permis à CFLX d’acquérir sa notoriété et de faire sa place dans le paysage radiophonique régional.

Les années 2000 sont sous le signe de la relance et débute le nouveau millénaire. CFLX confirme sa présence auprès de la communauté estrienne.  À partir de 2007, avec Bruno Guillemette au poste de directeur, marquera le début de plusieurs changements et une aire de stabilité. En 2013, l’arrivée de l’homme de radio Jacques Lavoie à la direction redonne un nouveau souffle à cette radio à saveur largement régionale.

2015 marquera donc la trentième année de diffusion sur la fréquence 95,5. Une histoire d’amour avec les auditeurs estriens qui répondent encore au soutien de leur radio.

Les distinctions

PRIX ADISQ

Au cours de ses trente années d’opération, CFLX s’est vu être nominée à plusieurs reprises pour le prix Station de radio communautaire de l’année – Marchés central et régional  au Gala de l’ADISQ, comme ce fut le cas en 2014.

En 1999, CFLX fut également primée par l’ADISQ pour le prix de la publicité régionale.

PRIX ASSOCIATION DES RADIODIFFUSEURS COMMUNAUTAIRES

CFLX s’est vu récompensée plusieurs fois pour la qualité de ses productions de  publicités locales soit en 1992, 1994, 1996, 1997, 1998.

La vision

CFLX est soucieuse d’offrir à ses membres et à ses auditeurs une qualité et une variété d’émissions constante et une expérience  toujours de plus en plus satisfaisante. C’est pourquoi notre équipe est à compléter l’installation de nouveaux équipements performants et  elle procédera au cours de l’année à des formations spécifiques pour ses animateurs et bénévoles.
